programme.title: Miss Nobody
programme.desc: Unlucky in love, living at home with her eccentric mom, and stuck in a dead end secretarial job at Judge Pharmaceuticals, Sarah Jane longs for more out of life. Her surprise promotion to junior executive appears to be just the ticket. But with promotion comes a competitive new world of wily, complicated executives, and Sarah Jane begins to eliminate the competition the only way she knows how - murder. During her climb to the top, she unexpectedly falls for the man of her dreams, Detective Bill Malloy - the cop intent on cracking the case of the mysterious deaths at Judge Pharmaceuticals.

programme.title: The Groomsmen
programme.desc: A 30-something man decides to marry his pregnant girlfriend and asks his four best friends to stand with him at the wedding, but as he observes his friends relationship troubles, he wrestles with issues of fatherhood, marriage and growing up.

programme.title: The Recall
programme.desc: The great Wesley Snipes (Blade himself!) stars as "The Hunter" in this Mauro Borrelli (The Ghostmaker) directed film. The Recall also stars RJ Mitte (Breaking Bad), Jedidiah Goodacre (Descendants), Niko Pepaj (Awkward), Laura Maria Bilgeri (Toby Goes to Camp) and Hannah Rose May (Ballers). The movie tells the tale of five friends vacationing at a remote lake house, expecting nothing less than a good time. Unbeknownst to them, Earth is under an alien invasion and in the thralls of a mass-abduction. Director Borelli is a former collaborator of director Tim Burton and the film illustrator for blockbuster films such as Pirates of the Caribbean and Captain America. The Recall will also be shot for the new Barco Escape three-screen, panoramic theatrical format, which fully surrounds audiences and offers the ultimate immersive cinema experience. Portions of the films will also be shot in Virtual Reality.

programme.title: Black Cop
programme.desc: A black police officer gets pushed to the edge after he is profiled and assaulted by the colleagues he worked side by side with, so he decides to get revenge and take his frustrations out on the community that he swore to protect.

programme.title: Modigliani
programme.desc: American drama, produced in 2004. An American, French, German, Italian, Rumanian, and British co-production. The story of Amedeo Modiglianis bitter rivalry with Pablo Picasso, and his tragic romance with Jeanne Hebuterne.

programme.title: Talea
programme.desc: Summertime. Everybody is excited to go on vacation to Italy. Everybody but Jasmin. Jasmin is yearning something. She wants to be with Eva, her mother, from whom she had to live seperately for a long time. For weeks, Jasmin is trying to get close to Eva. She does not give up, even if shes rejected. After an argument, Jasmin runs away from her fosterhome and convinces Eva to leave the city together and go on a trip. The two get closer -- sometimes as friends, sometimes as mother and daughter. A first joint cigarette, a dance in the village disco, wanderings through the woods. But expectations and needs of the girl and her mother are diverging repeatedly, especially when a man attracts Evas attention and disturbs the growing closeness between mother and daughter.

programme.title: Mayor Cupcake
programme.desc: A hard-working cupcake maker is inadvertently elected mayor of a small town burdened with debt. With no formal experience or education to speak of, she must rely on her street smarts to clean up the town.

programme.title: Saving Lincoln
programme.desc: Director Salvador Litvak and his writing partner, Nina Davidovich Litvak, based their screenplay on their extensive research into Lincolns friendship with Lamon. Saving Lincoln charts their relationship from their initial meeting to Lincolns Presidency. Lamon was a tall, boisterous Southerner who liked to drink whiskey, tell jokes and stories, play the banjo, and wrestle. Despite some pronounced differences between the two men, they shared a fondness for telling jokes and stories, and both felt slavery should be eliminated. Lamon often served as Lincolns private confidant.

programme.title: North and South: The Battle of New Market
programme.desc: Based on a true story of the American Civil War, culminating at the Battle of New Market, May 1864. A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley. Leaving behind their youth, these cadets must decide what they are fighting for.

programme.title: Irish Jam
programme.desc: A South Central L.A. con artist with rap skills tries to keep bill collectors and his lover, with marriage in mind, at bay by entering a poetry contest staged by a small Irish town. Can his rhyming skills help the town and win him the prize money?

programme.title: Wings Of Eagles
programme.desc: The continuing true story of Eric Liddells glorious life after winning Olympic gold in the 1924 Paris Olympics. Liddell has returned to China, where he was born to missionary parents, modestly avoiding celebrity in order to teach local schoolchildren. In 1937, the Japanese invade China at the outset of WWll. Liddell with his friend Xu Niu, a street smart resistance fighter, recognize the increasing danger so Liddell sends his wife, Florence and their two daughters to safety in Canada. Duty-bound, Liddell stays to minister to the civilian victims. Liddell and other foreign nationals are taken as prisoners and placed in one of the many Japanese internment camps where they are forced to endure for two years. Before the Japanese surrender, Liddell succumbs to a brain tumor. Yet his message of hope became immortal. Eric Liddells legacy continues to this day as he remains admired as a champion for life.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ambersons
programme.desc: The spoiled rotten and utterly unlikable rich kid George Amberson becomes horrified when his recently widowed mother rekindles her relationship with the wealthy Eugene Morgan, who she left decades earlier in order to marry Georges father. As George struggles to sabotage his mothers new romance, he must deal with his own romantic feelings for Morgans daughter and the consequences of his meddling as his once great family falls into ruin due to his machinations...

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: Mystery movie. American mystery, produced in 2017. Retired homicide detective Ray Archer and his partner, ex FBI agent Will Ruiney, are assigned to track down a vicious serial killer, who is playing a twisted version of the childrens game Hangman.

programme.title: Existenz
programme.desc: A game designer on the run from assassins must play her latest virtual reality creation with a marketing trainee to determine if the game has been damaged.

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Bob and Amy are at a crossroads: she wants to adopt a child, he doesnt. Will renovating their house and rescuing animals solve their problems? Will their new handyman and his sons pregnant girlfriend be the miracle theyre looking for?...

programme.title: Land Of the Blind
programme.desc: A soldier recounts his relationship with a famous political prisoner attempting to overthrow their countrys authoritarian government.

programme.title: Slackers
programme.desc: Dave Goodman, Sam Schecter, and Jeff Davis are best friends who have spent almost four years at Holden University scamming their way through college. During one exam scam in their final semester Dave discovers Angela, and asks her out while writing his phone number on her exam sheet. Ethan Dulles (who calls himself "Cool Ethan"), a classmate obsessed with Angela to the extent of collecting loose hairs and making a hair doll and having surveillance photos and a shrine to Angela setup in his dorm room, takes her exam question sheet after Angela leaves and uses it to repeatedly confront and then blackmail the guys into setting up a successful date with Angela for him in exchange for his silence on the matter. The guys set Ethan up in multiple situations in an attempt to convince Angela to like him, while Dave tells Sam during their work researching her that Angela is no more important to him as any other scam theyve done. Ethan fails to attract her after frequent confrontations based on his delusional behavior, immaturity and ignorance of social norms. Though Ethan seems a lonely harmless nerd, he is scheming, psychotically obsessive and hopelessly socially incompetent.

programme.title: Guido Superstar: The Rise of Guido
programme.desc: An Italian immigrant is thrust into the world of drug-lords, supercars and secret agents in this hilarious action comedy. After losing his job at the Disco Valet Company for undue heroism, Guido (Silvio Pollio) must pose as a Sicilian gangster for the FBI in order to infiltrate a powerful Asian gang. Things go sour and take a turn for the worse. Guido must now make amends before he is discovered and killed, or worse, deported.

programme.title: The Lucky Dragon
programme.desc: A young, Chinese dragon punished by the gods to be a mere mortal is cast down to earth. He is forced to make his way in a strange land until the evil forces discover his true identity. Take part in a world full of imagination while following the journey of a mischievous dragon who has been transformed by magic into a little boy and exiled from his home to live among humans. When both good and evil forces learn that a dragon has arrived, they look for him as he is the only one who can find the magical sword—whose owner can rule the universe! Will he find the sword in time before it gets into the wrong hands? Will he ever become a dragon again?

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old York Hayes, leader of the Fire Dragon Scout Troops, returns to Camp Rahuta for his final scout camp. York has decided to take the best step of his life.

programme.title: My Dads Christmas Date
programme.desc: Ever since his wife died, David struggles to get on with his teenage daughter Jules. She feels hemmed in and misunderstood, and he finds himself more and more powerless and lonely. In order to find a new partner for her dad and someone to talk to for herself, Jules creates online profiles on dating sites for David. Things suddenly take a funny turn, because although there is no shortage of candidates, they all fall short of Davids ... and Juless expectations. Will everything take a fresh turn on Christmas? A funny, heartwarming story in a wonderful Xmas mood!

programme.title: Digging Into China
programme.desc: Harriet, a ten-year old girl, lives together with her big sister and her alcoholic mother out in the countryside. The family runs a motel. Harriet is different from the others, as she owns a great creativity and has nobody to play with. Her infinite world exists only in her mind. One day, Ricky comes along. He is a grown-up, but retarded son of an elderly lady. Soon, Harriet and Ricky share their experiences of life from a different point of view and become close friends. But his mother still plans to give Ricky away into professional care in a home, because she wont live forever to be there for him.

programme.title: Corner Office
programme.desc: The story of a compulsive bureaucrat, Orson, who discovers a secret room.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: Rosie, a divorced mother, lives with her daughter in LA. But her life is not exactly ideal. The tv show she has been working on seems doomed. Her ex-husband just had a baby with a younger woman, while her daughter has started dating boys!

programme.title: Prince and Me 2: The Royal Wedding
programme.desc: The Prince and Me 2: The Royal Wedding continues the story of 2003s fantasy romance The Prince and Me. In the earlier film, Paige (Julia Stiles) - a midwestern college co-ed - falls in love with Edvard (Luke Mably), sans realizing that he is actually the Prince of Denmark. In this sequel, Paige (now played by neophyte Kam Heskin) and Eddie must confront a centuries-old Danish edict declaring that if a Danish prince marries a commoner, he must abdicate his throne. C

programme.title: Extract
programme.desc: Jason Bateman, Kristen Wiig, Ben Affleck and Mila Kunis star in Mike Judges workplace comedy. Joel Reynolds (Bateman) is the founder of a company that produces and bottles flavour extracts. His marital love life has flatlined, but he cant bring himself to cheat on his wife Suzie (Wiig), until his friend Dean (Affleck) convinces him to hire a gigolo to seduce her, thus freeing Joel to also play the field. This will prove to be a worse idea than it sounds. But that will be the least of his worries, as a horrific accident in the bottling plant, a grifting employee (Kunis), an aggressive lawyer (Gene Simmons) and striking workers bring his company to its knees...

programme.title: Hit List
programme.desc: Charlotte is a woman with anger management issues whose therapist suggests she write a journal to keep her emotions in check. Unlucky in love, she ventures online to find a boyfriend. Just as she reaches her limit of unsuccessful dates, Charlotte meets her soul mate Lyle. Everything is perfect until Lyle finds Charlottes journal and sets out to prove just how deeply he loves her.

programme.title: Looks That Kill
programme.desc: Max Richards, a teenage boy born with a medical condition of being lethally attractive, who is changed forever when he meets Alex, a girl with her own bizarre ailment, who aids him on his quest of self-discovery... without accidentally killing someone.

programme.title: Shoreditch
programme.desc: Set both on the eve of World War II in a shady Shoreditch nightclub and in present-day London. Thirtysomething Tom tries to solve a murder that was committed in the club decades before.

programme.title: Mušpapīrs
programme.desc: Vienkāršs gājiens uz banku, lai izņemtu skaidru naudu, Tripam beidzas ar nokļūšanu gūstā pie divām bankas aplaupītāju bandām vienlaikus. Viņam nākas veikt viltīgus un drosmīgus trikus, lai atbrīvotu ķīlniekus un iekarotu klusībā mīlētās bankas darbinieces sirdi. Taču nekas nav tā, kā tas sākumā izskatās, un pārsteigumi seko viens otram.

programme.title: Sekss un lielpilsēta
programme.desc: Kerijas Bredšovas sapnis beidzot ir piepildījies – viņa precēsies ar Lielisko vīrieti. Viņš jau reiz ir bijis laulībā, tāpēc vēlas nelielas svinības, taču Kerija, pielaikojot labāko dizaineru kāzu kleitas, ātri vien aizraujas ar domu par modes dāmas sapņu kāzām. Pēc sarunas ar Mirandu, kura būtībā runā par savas laulības problēmām, Lielisko vīrieti pārņem šaubas. Stīva un Mirandas attiecībās iestājies panīkums, tāpēc abi pārguļ ar citiem cilvēkiem un galu galā izšķiras. Kad Lieliskais vīrietis pamet Keriju pie altāra, draudzenes dodas ceļojumā, kam bija jākļūst par jaunā pāra medusmēnesi. Draudzenes ir lieliska kompānija, taču Kerija nespēj uzreiz atgūt dzīvesprieku. Samantu kaitina prombūtne no arvien nevaļīgākā Smita, kura aktiera karjera uzņem apgriezienus, tāpēc viņa izseko glīto jaunekli. Valentīna dienā Miranda atzīstas Kerijai, ka ir vainojama Lieliskā vīrieša bēgšanā. Rezultātā Kerija izlīgst ar savu mīļoto, un abi salaulājas miertiesneša kabinetā.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Pastaiga sniegotā purvā

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Mušpapīrs
programme.desc: Vienkāršs gājiens uz banku, lai izņemtu skaidru naudu, Tripam beidzas ar nokļūšanu gūstā pie divām bankas aplaupītāju bandām vienlaikus. Viņam nākas veikt viltīgus un drosmīgus trikus, lai atbrīvotu ķīlniekus un iekarotu klusībā mīlētās bankas darbinieces sirdi. Taču nekas nav tā, kā tas sākumā izskatās, un pārsteigumi seko viens otram.

programme.title: Gals klāt!
programme.desc: Bohēmisku ballīti aktiera Džeimsa Franko mājās pārtrauc neizprotamas un graujošas dabas parādības. Vairums viesu namu pamet, bet paliek daži viņa draugi, tai skaitā arī Sets Rogens un Džona Hils. Pārtikas un dzeramā nav daudz, iziet uz ielas ir pārāk bīstami, taču "zālītes" un citu narkotisko vielu viņiem ir pārpārēm. Aktieri vada dienas gan izklaidējoties, gan apsverot nākotnes filmu scenārijus un strīdoties, bet pienāk brīdis, kad nopietna iemesla dēļ puiši ir spiesti bēgt no mājas, lai meklētu glābiņu un atklātu atbildi uz jautājumu - kas ir tas, kas viņus apdraud?

programme.title: Sekss un lielpilsēta
programme.desc: Kerijas Bredšovas sapnis beidzot ir piepildījies – viņa precēsies ar Lielisko vīrieti. Viņš jau reiz ir bijis laulībā, tāpēc vēlas nelielas svinības, taču Kerija, pielaikojot labāko dizaineru kāzu kleitas, ātri vien aizraujas ar domu par modes dāmas sapņu kāzām. Kad Lieliskais vīrietis pamet Keriju pie altāra, draudzenes dodas ceļojumā, kam bija jākļūst par jaunā pāra medusmēnesi. Draudzenes ir lieliska kompānija, taču Kerija nespēj uzreiz atgūt dzīvesprieku. Samantu kaitina prombūtne no arvien nevaļīgākā Smita, kura aktiera karjera uzņem apgriezienus, tāpēc viņa izseko glīto jaunekli. programme.title: Vecāks par 21 gadu
programme.desc: Džefs ir paraugstudents, kurš līdz šim visu darījis pareizi un mācījies cītīgi. Taču viņa divdesmit pirmā dzimšanas diena iekritusi tieši pirms iestājeksāmieniem medicīnas skolā, un viņa divi labākie draugi uzaicina Džefu iedzert alu. Kad Džefs pārmaiņas pēc nolemj šajā dienā beidzot darīt visu, ko vien viņam iegribas, ieplānotais mierīgais vakars izvēršas par īstu elli, kur neviens no iesaistītajiem nespēs aizmirst vēl ilgi.

programme.title: Matrikss. Atjaunots
programme.desc: Ja nu pareģojums ir bijis patiess? Ja nu rīt karš būs beidzies? Vai tā dēļ nav vērts cīnīties? Vai tā dēļ nav vērts mirt?

programme.title: Hanna
programme.desc: Hannai ir tikai 16 gadu, bet spēkos, izturībā un attapībā viņa var mēroties ar specvienības kareivi. Hanna dziļos Somijas mežos uzaugusi kopā ar tēvu, ar nemitīgiem treniņiem un izturības pārbaudēm viņš tīņu meiteni ir izaudzinājis par perfektu slepkavu.

Taču viņa divdesmit pirmā dzimšanas diena iekritusi tieši pirms iestājeksāmieniem medicīnas skolā, un viņa divi labākie draugi uzaicina Džefu iedzert alu. programme.title: Matrikss. Atjaunots
programme.desc: Ja nu pareģojums ir bijis patiess? Ja nu rīt karš būs beidzies? Vai tā dēļ nav vērts cīnīties? Vai tā dēļ nav vērts mirt?

programme.title: Vecāks par 21 gadu
programme.desc: Džefs ir paraugstudents, kurš līdz šim visu darījis pareizi un mācījies cītīgi. Taču viņa divdesmit pirmā dzimšanas diena iekritusi tieši pirms iestājeksāmieniem medicīnas skolā, un viņa divi labākie draugi uzaicina Džefu iedzert alu. Kad Džefs pārmaiņas pēc nolemj šajā dienā beidzot darīt visu, ko vien viņam iegribas, ieplānotais mierīgais vakars izvēršas par īstu elli, kur neviens no iesaistītajiem nespēs aizmirst vēl ilgi.

programme.title: Hanna
programme.desc: Hannai ir tikai 16 gadu, bet spēkos, izturībā un attapībā viņa var mēroties ar specvienības kareivi. Hanna dziļos Somijas mežos uzaugusi kopā ar tēvu, ar nemitīgiem treniņiem un izturības pārbaudēm viņš tīņu meiteni ir izaudzinājis par perfektu slepkavu.

programme.title: Septiņi psihopāti
programme.desc: Nesekmīgs scenārists netīšām iepinies Losandželosas kriminālajā pasaulē. Tas noticis, kad viņa dīvainie draugi nolaupa gangstera mīļoto šicu.

programme.title: Sekss un lielpilsēta
programme.desc: Šoreiz četras nešķiramās draudzenes pēc paša šeiha uzaicinājuma dodas uz Arābu Emirātiem. Divu gadu laikā pēc Kerijas kāzām ir notikušas daudzas pārmaiņas. Šarlotei grūtības sagādā divu meitu mātes loma, Mirandai ir jauns vadītājs – sieviešu nīdējs, un Kerija pavada vakarus kopā ar Džonu, skatoties veco kino un ēdot uz mājām piegādātu restorānu ēdienu. Samantas uzaicinājums pavadīt nedēļas nogali ekskluzīvā Abū Dabī viesnīcā ir tieši laikā visām meitenēm. Iepazīšanās ar austrumu kultūru būs ekstrēma, bīstama un neparedzama neatkarīgajām amerikāņu dāmītēm, kuras pieradušas pie seksuāliem tērpiem, patstāvības un demokrātiskiem likumiem.

programme.title: Operācija "Kazino"
programme.desc: Skots un Keita Johanseni ir spiesti atrast veidus, kā iegūt naudu savas meitas skološanai - viņa nav ieguvusi kāroto stipendiju. Kad šķiet, ka viss ir pajucis, pāris nolemj apvienot spēkus ar kaimiņu Frenku, kopīgi mājās izveidojot pagrīdes kazino.

programme.title: Stāsts par Levinu Deivisu
programme.desc: Drāma par vienu nedēļu kāda jauna folka dziedātāja dzīvē, kurš iepazīst Griničvilidžas folkmūzikas pasauli. Ar ģitāru plecā viņš cīnās ar skarbo Ņujorkas ziemu un cenšas kļūt par īstu mūziķi, saskaroties ar šķietami nepārvaramiem šķēršļiem, turklāt dažus no tiem rada viņš pats.

programme.title: Biļete
programme.desc: Kad akls vīrietis negaidīti atgūst redzi, viņš kļūst apsēsts ar tieksmi pēc labākas dzīves - pēc smalkākas mājas, labāk apmaksāta darba, - neatstājot vietu cilvēkiem, kuri bija nozīmīgi viņa iepriekšējā dzīvē.

programme.title: Eleonoras rigbijas pazušana
programme.desc: Konors un Eleonora dzīvo Manhetenā. Viņi ir precējušies vairākus gadus, tomēr joprojām ir ļoti dažādi. Viņam pieder neliels restorāns. Viņas ģimene (tēvs profesors un māte vijolniece) savulaik ne sevišķi atbalstīja meitas izvēli. Konora tēvu dēla dzīve neinteresē vispār. Konora un Eleonoras dzīvē tam visam nav nekādas nozīmes, jo viņi ir radījuši savu mīlestības pilno pasauli. Dramatiski notikumi sagrauj rūpīgi radīto pasaulīti un Eleonora nolemj… izgaist…

programme.title: Būt par Flinnu
programme.desc: Strādājot Bostonas bezpajumtnieku patversmē, Niks Flinns sastapies ar savu tēvu - krāpnieku un pašpasludinātu rakstnieku. Jūtot problēmas paša dzīvē, Niks nolemj no jauna uzmeklēt savu radinieku.

programme.title: Hičkoks
programme.desc: Būdams jau populārs un pieprasīts režisors, Alfrēds Hičkoks ļaujas pārdrošam eksperimentam - lielbudžeta filmu vietā uzņemt ļoti pieticīgu, melnbaltu trilleri "Psiho". Negūstot atbalstu no studijas puses, Hičkoks nolemj pats finansēt savu filmu. Kopā ar savu sievu un asistenti Almu Revilu, režisors dodas cilvēka dvēseles tumšāko bezdibeņu pētījumos, lai atrasto tos nervu galus, uz kuriem kā klavieres taustiņiem, meistars varētu nospēlēt skatītāju emocijās īstenu šausmu simfoniju.

programme.title: Omārs
programme.desc: Netālā distopiskā nākotnē, saskaņā ar pilsētas likumiem, cilvēki bez otrās puses tiek aizvesti uz viesnīcu, kur viņi ir spiesti 45 dienu laikā atrast romantisku partneri. Citādi viņi tiek pārvērsti par nezvēriem un nosūtīti uz mežu.

programme.title: Klusā revolūcija
programme.desc: Filma vēsta par Vācijas Demokrātiskās Republikas izlaiduma klasi, kas saistībā ar 1956. gada Ungārijas revolūciju mācību stundās spontāni nolemj ievērot klusuma minūti, lai godinātu upurus. Solidaritātes apliecināšanai ir sekas, kādas nav gaidījuši ne skolēni, ne viņu vecāki, ne skolas vadība. VDR izglītības ministrs to uzskata par kontrrevolucionāru rīcību un pieprasa, lai skolēni nedēļas laikā atklāj musinātāja vārdu. Taču skolēni ir saliedēti un līdz ar to nonāk izšķiroša lēmuma priekšā.

programme.title: Tu neesi tu
programme.desc: Algotais slepkava ar iesauku "Nāves eņģelis" Maikls Salivans uzticīgi kalpo savam bosam Džonam Rūnijam, pateicoties kuram reiz uz ielas atrastais bārenis Maiks ir ieguvis "augstāko izglītību" gangsteru profesijā. Aukstasinīgais un nežēlīgais Rūnijs - Čikāgas īru mafijas krusttēvs - , kura organizācija asi konkurē ar itāļiem, veldzējumu savai sirdij gūst vienīgi Maikla sabiedrībā un rotaļājoties ar Maikla abiem dēliem Maiklu junioru un Pīteru. Abu pusaudžu acīs pilsētas gangsteru vadonis ir ne vairāk kā jauks vectēvs - interesantu un audzinošu stāstu zinātājs un zēnu labākais draugs viņu kopējās spēlēs.

programme.title: Zoe Bakes
programme.desc: During hot weather, Zoë stays cool by making an icebox cake with chocolate wafers and caramel cream, and a no-bake British dessert called a posset.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: Shift 3: Resourcefulness. Fatigue sets in as the chefs face hours seven and eight while turning one bag of ingredients into three distinct meals for judge Scott Conant.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: After combating countless "impossible dinners," Chef Robert Irvine faces a daunting new challenge: save Americas most desperate restaurants from impending failure in just two days with only $10,000. In his new prime-time Food Network series, Restaurant: Impossible, Robert uses creativity and resourcefulness along with a lot of muscle in his fight to rescue these restaurants and give hope to the owners and their employees. Day one of the extreme mission begins with a thorough business assessment as Robert launches the restaurant into full service, closely observes the staff and kitchen, and determines their weakest spots. Then, he springs into action by updating the menu, retraining the staff and implementing aesthetic changes with the help of his design team. To ensure a packed house for the grand re-opening at the end of day two, Robert hits the streets to tell the community about the improved restaurant. Will the ruthless schedule, tight budget and ambitious task overcome Roberts lofty goals, or will this tall order result in restaurant triumph?

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Two talented chefs go head-to-head for the chance to Beat Bobby Flay. To get to Bobby the chefs must first face off against each other, creating a spectacular dish with a secret ingredient of Bobbys choice. Judges Alex Guarnaschelli and Jeff Mauro know Bobbys strengths and his weaknesses. Their goal: Pick the chef who has the skills to take down Bobby Flay in his own arena. The winning chef gets to challenge Bobby with his or her surprise signature dish. If Bobby goes down, the winner can tell the world, "I beat Bobby Flay!"

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: In Food Networks series Kids Baking Championship, hosts and judges Duff Goldman and Valerie Bertinelli will lead eight talented kid bakers through challenges designed to find the most-impressive and creative young baker. In each challenge the contestants, ranging in age from 10 to 13, will be tested on their baking skills and originality as they whip up delectable desserts, including creative cakes, mouthwatering cookies and pastries.

programme.title: BBQ Brawl: Flay V. Symon
programme.desc: Join our hosts, renowned celebrity chefs and restaurateurs Bobby Flay and Michael Symon, as they test the skills of eight expert barbecue connoisseurs. Filmed at the Star Hill Ranch in Austin, Texas, the eight chefs are divided into two teams but, in order to claim first pick for their team, Bobby and Michael go head-to-head in a backyard BBQ challenge. Each episode sees one of the chefs being eliminated from the show until there is only one left, the winner who is awarded the title of Master of Cue. The weekly contests aim to reveal the chefs talents and expose their weaknesses and include tasks such as cooking up a tomahawk rib-eye and taking on a Texas beef challenge.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: In Food Networks series Kids Baking Championship, hosts and judges Duff Goldman and Valerie Bertinelli will lead eight talented kid bakers through challenges designed to find the most-impressive and creative young baker. In each challenge the contestants, ranging in age from 10 to 13, will be tested on their baking skills and originality as they whip up delectable desserts, including creative cakes, mouthwatering cookies and pastries.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: After combating countless "impossible dinners," Chef Robert Irvine faces a daunting new challenge: save Americas most desperate restaurants from impending failure in just two days with only $10,000. In his new prime-time Food Network series, Restaurant: Impossible, Robert uses creativity and resourcefulness along with a lot of muscle in his fight to rescue these restaurants and give hope to the owners and their employees. Day one of the extreme mission begins with a thorough business assessment as Robert launches the restaurant into full service, closely observes the staff and kitchen, and determines their weakest spots. Then, he springs into action by updating the menu, retraining the staff and implementing aesthetic changes with the help of his design team. To ensure a packed house for the grand re-opening at the end of day two, Robert hits the streets to tell the community about the improved restaurant. Will the ruthless schedule, tight budget and ambitious task overcome Roberts lofty goals, or will this tall order result in restaurant triumph?

programme.title: Candy Land
programme.desc: Five teams of professional cake makers compete in a series of testing challenges, with the winning team taking home a whopping $25,000. Each team is challenged to create a stunning, edible showpiece, but they are also given further instructions as the show progresses. They must use all of their artistry, flair and baking talent to have any chance of impressing the judges and taking home the winnings.

programme.title: Paul Hollywood City Bakes
programme.desc: Paul Hollywood City Bakes is hosted by the British most loved baker, Paul Hollywood, who explores 10 cities around the globe. He is looking for the family bakeries, corner delis and luxury hotels which have created the baking heritage of entire cities. From Cape Town to Reykjavik, Paul will personally guide into the tastiest baking to be found there, each cities own culture and unique history. Exploring the sights of each city Paul gets inspired and creates two unique recipes of his own.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: In Food Networks series Kids Baking Championship, hosts and judges Duff Goldman and Valerie Bertinelli will lead eight talented kid bakers through challenges designed to find the most-impressive and creative young baker. In each challenge the contestants, ranging in age from 10 to 13, will be tested on their baking skills and originality as they whip up delectable desserts, including creative cakes, mouthwatering cookies and pastries.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Two talented chefs go head-to-head for the chance to Beat Bobby Flay. To get to Bobby the chefs must first face off against each other, creating a spectacular dish with a secret ingredient of Bobbys choice. Judges Alex Guarnaschelli and Jeff Mauro know Bobbys strengths and his weaknesses. Their goal: Pick the chef who has the skills to take down Bobby Flay in his own arena. The winning chef gets to challenge Bobby with his or her surprise signature dish. If Bobby goes down, the winner can tell the world, "I beat Bobby Flay!"

programme.title: Supermarket Stakeout
programme.desc: Supermarket Stakeout is an American cooking competition TV series presented by chef Alex Guarnaschelli. Every participant of the show has a budget of $500 to purchase the groceries from the customers of a nearby supermarket, and create dishes later out of it. In each round the host assigns the theme of the dish to cook. The chef whose dish is judged the least satisfactory is eliminated from the competition, and the final chef remaining gets a prize of $10,000.

programme.title: Harry Potter: Wizards of Baking

programme.title: The Great Russian Lie
programme.desc: A documentary series dedicated to debunking the most influential myths of Russian propaganda. The project goes beyond the analysis of ordinary " fake news " to explore the deep historical manipulations that Russia uses as a tool of external aggression and justification of imperial ambitions.

programme.title: Pats varmācīgākais gads
programme.desc: 1981. gads Ņujorkā. Ambiciozs imigrants cīnās par savu uzņēmumu un ģimeni visbīstamākajā gadā šīs pilsētas vēsturē.

programme.title: Māceklis
programme.desc: Stāsts par meistaru un viņa mācekli Ņujorkas nekustamo īpašumu džungļos. 70. gadu sākumā Donalds Tramps ir iesācējs – kompleksu mākts lietu kārtotājs, kurš atrodas tētuka Trampa seniora pavēnī. Iepazīstoties ar advokātu Roju Konu, viņa dzīve mainās. Zogot no citiem idejas, spārnotus teicienus (arī no Reigana) un pārņemot Kona taktiku, Tramps kļūst par savu "labāko versiju". AIDS epidēmija, šovbiznesa ziedonis un itāļu marmora modernās pilis. Pilsēta, kas nekad neguļ, ir Trampa spēļu laukums – tiesa, tajā viņam pašam kļūst par šauru.

programme.title: Bezvēsts pazudusi
programme.desc: Aizraujošs un mistisks trilleris, kas liek pārdomāt to, cik labi mēs patiesībā pazīstam savus tuvākos. Kad pēc Kolombijā ar jauno draugu pavadītām brīvdienām pazūd viņas māte, Džūna sāk meklēt atbildes, kurām piekļūt liedz starptautiska birokrātija. Atrodoties tūkstošiem kilometru attālumā, Losandželosā, Džūna radoši izmanto jaunākās pieejamās tehnoloģijas, lai censtos māti atrast, pirms ir par vēlu.

programme.title: Melnais lācis
programme.desc: Radošu krīzi piedzīvojoša filmu veidotāja meklē vienatni kādā lauku retrītā, taču saprot, ka mežs tikai piešķir spēku viņas iekšējiem dēmoniem.

programme.title: Trakās ķepas. Leģenda par Henku
programme.desc: Henks varbūt ir necils suns, taču viņš ir apņēmības pilns kļūt par samuraju. Suņuks dodas uz valsti, kur čum un mudž no kaķiem. Tur Henks satiek nejauko kaķu karavadoni Iku Ču un arī Džimbo, kurš reiz bijis varens samurajs. Džimbo paņem Henku savā paspārnē un iemāca viņam, ko īsti nozīmē būt samurajam. Dzimstot pirmajai īstajai draudzībai starp kaķi un suni, abiem nākas glābt Kakamučo no ļaunā Ika Ču.

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Zvirbulis Ričijs kopš dzimšanas pieņemts stārķu ģimenē, visi viņu ļoti mīl, viņš ātri aug un jūtas kā īsts stārķis. Taču gājputniem stārķiem pienāk laiks lidot uz Āfriku, lai tur ziemotu. Ģimene ir spiesta atklāt Ričijam viņa izcelšanos, jo lidot kopā nedrīkst – grūtajā ceļojumā zvirbulis var iet bojā. Drosminieks negrasās nolaist spārnus un nolemj visiem pierādīt, ka ir īsts stārķis. Ričijs viens pats dodas ceļā, un viņam pievienojas jauni draugi – pūce Olga un papagailis Kiki.

programme.title: Līdz uzvaras vārtiem
programme.desc: Bez darba palikušais un alkoholu mīlošais futbola treneris Tomass Rongens dodas uz Amerikāņu Samoa, lai vadītu izlasi un palīdzētu tai sagatavoties Pasaules čempionāta atlases sacensībām. Galvenā problēma valstsvienības pastāvēšanas vēsturē: tā vēl ne reizi nav iesitusi nevienus vārtus un spēles laikā ir uzstādījusi antirekordu futbola vēsturē - 31 reizi vienas spēles laikā bumba ielaista viņu vārtos. Tomasu sagaida grūts darbs ne tikai ar komandu, bet arī pašam ar sevi.

programme.title: Bēbis boss
programme.desc: Tims Templtons ir savu vecāku uzmanības centrā. Un tā tas ir līdz brīdim, kad viņš satiek savu jauno brālīti – jaundzimušo pieguļošā uzvalkā ar uzņēmēja iemaņām. Abi kašķējas kā jau visi brāļi, izmantojot gan pazemojošas izjokošanas, gan tuvcīņas. Tomēr viņi beidz savas domstarpības, kad bēbis boss atklāj savu ģeniālo plāno, kā iegūt atpakaļ uzmanību, kas veltīta viņu galvenajiem konkurentiem kucēniem. Abi savāc pilsētas mazo bērnu bandu un ar šīs dīvainās komandas palīdzību mēģina izjaukt gaidāmo pasākumu mājdzīvniekiem, lai atgūtu mazuļu likumīgo vietu mīlīguma hierarhijā.

programme.title: Viens pats mājās
programme.desc: Ziemassvētku brīvdienās dodoties uz Parīzi, Makkalisteru ģimene nejauši aizmirst mājās savu astoņgadīgo dēlu Kevinu. Tiesa, tas zēnam neliedz sarīkot pašam savas Ziemassvētku svinības. Beidzot viņu neviens vairs nekomandē, neierobežo un nepieskata! Viss būtu ideāli, ja vien rūdītie kramplauži Harijs un Mārvs nebūtu ieplānojuši apzagt visas tuvākās apkaimes mājas pašā svētku vakarā.

programme.title: Pavadonis
programme.desc: Lai pārdzīvotu vispārējo kāzu drudzi, kas pārņēmis vasaru, divi neprecēti draugi Bens un Alise nolemj būt viens otra pavadoņi katrās kāzās, kurās viņi ir ielūgti.

programme.title: Robotu sapņi
programme.desc: Suņa un robota piedzīvojumi un neveiksmes Ņujorkā 80.-ajos gados.

programme.title: Mošķu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Kas jauns mošķu pasaulē? Kāzas! Ragana un viņas iemīļotais Renfīlds, grāfa Drakulas sulainis, nolēmuši neslēpt savas jūtas un... salaulāties! Taču nupat sākusies laulību ceremonija tūdaļ pārtrūkst. Viesu acu priekšā mīlētājus nolaupa ar pārcilvēciskām spējām apveltītā mošķu medniece Mila. Šai mazulītei labāk netuvoties. Viņa ir ātrāka par vēju un apgādāta ar vismodernākajām tehnoloģijām - tās ieraugot, pat Džeimss Bonds viņu apskaustu.

programme.title: Madagaskara
programme.desc: Iemīļotie animācijas filmas "Madagaskara" varoņi ir atgriezušies! Pingvīni, liekot lietā teju vai militāru precizitāti un visus iespējamos līdzekļus, ir saremontējuši vecu, reiz avarējušu lidmašīnu. Iecerēts, ka tieši tajā pazīstamie Madagaskaras varoņi dosies atpakaļ uz mājām - uz Ņujorku. Plāns ir labs, taču drīz vien Alekss, Mārtijs, Melmans, Glorija un pingvīnu komanda strauji piezemējas mežonīgajos Āfrikas plašumos, kur zoodārzā augusī četrotne pirmoreiz satiek savus sugas brāļus. Kāds no viņiem šeit atradīs savus radus, citam būs romantiski piedzīvojumi, bet nav gan zināms, vai Āfrika būs labāka par viņu mājām Centrālparka zoodārzā...

programme.title: Kliedziens
programme.desc: "Scream" turpinājumā Ghostface slepkavībās izdzīvojušie atstāj Vudsboro un sāk jaunu dzīvi Ņujorkā.

programme.title: Nekad nelaid vaļā
programme.desc: Jaunajā psiholoģiskajā trillerī/šausmu filmā, kad pasauli pārņem ļaunums, vienīgais, kas spēj pasargāt māti, ko atveido "Oskara" laureāte Hale Berija, un viņas dvīņu puikas, ir viņu māja un ģimeni sargājošā saikne. Lai visu laiku būtu kopā – pat sasienot sevi ar virvēm – viņi turas viens pie otra, mudinot nekad nelaist vaļā. Bet, kad vienam no zēniem rodas šaubas, vai ļaunums ir īsts, saikne, kas viņus vieno, tiek pārrauta, izraisot šausminošu cīņu par izdzīvošanu.

programme.title: Vecais Henrijs
programme.desc: Kad zemnieks savā mājā uzņem ievainotu vīrieti, pie kura atrodas maiss ar naudu, viņš tiek ierauts ārpuslikuma krustugunīs. Kad lido lodes un atklājas ievainotā vīrieša identitāte, vecajam zemniekam ir jāizlemj - kuram uzticēties un pret kuru cīnīties.

programme.title: Taisnīguma bruņinieki
programme.desc: Galvenā varoņa sieva iet bojā dzelzceļa katastrofā. Tā sākas stāsts par trakāko un atriebīgāko izmeklēšanu, uz ko spējīga karavīra, hakera un divu dīvainu matemātiķu kompānija.

programme.title: Kapteinis Zobenzobs un burvju briljants
programme.desc: Ļaunais princis Megans Hans no džungļiem un Karību jūras pirāts kapteinis Zobenzobs jau sen dzen maģiskā briljanta pēdas. Tas nav parasts dārgakmens. Pusnaktī tas spēj piepildīt viskvēlāko vēlēšanos, lai kāda tā būtu. Visi meklējumi "kaķim zem astes", taču tad, klejodams pa džungļiem, burvju dārgakmeni nejauši ierauga mazais Marks.

programme.title: Kentervilas spoks
programme.desc: Sera Saimona de Kentervila rēgs jau 300 gadus klīst pa savrupmāju, meklēdams drosmīgu pēcnācēju, kurš viņu varētu atbrīvot no lāsta.

programme.title: Tauriņa stāsts
programme.desc: Tuvojoties ziemai, monarhu tauriņi migrē uz dienvidiem, lai pārziemotu siltumā. Taču Patrika spārni vēl nav gatavi tālajam ceļam, un viņš nevar lidot. Nedomādams padoties, Patriks kopā ar savu labāko draugu kāpuru Mārtiju paslēpjas pārtikas treilerī, kuru velk Dženifera. Tomēr arī viņai ir savas bažas par ceļojumu, jo - tauriņam neierasti - viņu māc bailes no augstuma. Visus trīs gaida daudz piedzīvojumu un sūri gūtu mācību, līdz mērķis būs sasniegts.

programme.title: Madagaskaras pingvīni
programme.desc: Bezbailīgie pingvīni Kapteinis, Kovalskis, Riko un Ierindnieks, kuri ir labākie spiegi, kādi jebkad izšķīlušies no olas, apvieno spēkus ar smalku slepeno organizāciju "Ziemeļvējš". Izskatīgā un brašā aģenta Slepenā vadībā viņiem kopā jāaptur ļaunais doktors Oktāvijs Brīze, kurš ir nodomājis iznīcināt pasauli.

programme.title: Snūpijs un Čārlijs Brauns: Riekstiņu filma
programme.desc: Čarlijs Brauns, Snūpijs un visi pārējie atgriežas ar šo aizkustinošo stāstu. Kad apkārtnē uz dzīvi apmetas jauna sarkanmataina meitene, Čārlijs Brauns viņā iemīlas. Viņš vairākkārt mēģina pievērst jaunās meitenes uzmanību un dažādos veidos mēģina savā dzīvē kaut ko sasniegt, taču katru reizi šķiet, ka neveicas arvien vairāk. Vai viņam izdosies iepatikties savai mīlestībai? Tajā pašā laikā Snūpijs apņemas tikt galā ar savu ļaunāko ienaidnieku - Sarkano Baronu.

programme.title: Viens pats mājās
programme.desc: Iepriekšējos Ziemassvētkos, dodoties brīvdienās uz Franciju, Makkalisteri aizmirsa mājās savu jaunāko atvasi Kevinu. Šogad, dodoties uz Floridu, viņi dēlu pazaudē lidostā. Kamēr ģimene lido uz Maiami, Kevins ar tēva kredītkartēm kabatā ir ceļā uz Ņujorku. Lielajā pilsētā viņš atrod jaunus draugus, iekārtojas lepnākajā viesnīcā un sastop arī savus vecos paziņas – divus aprobežotos kramplaužus. Šoreiz abi ļaundari Ziemassvētku vakarā plāno apzagt lielāko rotaļlietu veikalu Ņujorkā. Turklāt viņi jau sen alkst atriebties Kevinam – zēnam, kura dēļ nonāca cietumā.

programme.title: Pie visa vainīga mīlestība
programme.desc: Žoslēns ir veiksmīgs biznesmenis, toties mīlas dzīvē – patmīlīgs brunču mednieks. Kad viņš mēģina jau atkal savaldzināt jaunu sievieti, izliekoties, ka ir ratiņkrēslā, viņa iepazīstina Žoslēnu ar savu māsu, kura patiešām piesaistīta dzīvei ratiņkrēslā.

programme.title: Titāniks
programme.desc: Savā pirmajā braucienā dodas pasaules lielākais kuģis "Titāniks". Uz kuģa klāja tūkstošiem cilvēku ar cerībām un bailēm gaida nokļūšanu galamērķī – Amerikā. Starp šiem cilvēkiem ir nabadzīgs mākslinieks Džeks, kā arī septiņpadsmit gadus vecā Roza – skaista un bagāta meitene, kurai apnikusi vecāku ārišķīgā un liekulīgā pasaule. "Titānika" būvētāji ir pārliecināti par to, ka kuģi nav iespējams nogremdēt, taču, kad kuģa ceļā gadās milzīgs aisbergs, Rozas un Džeka romantiskais piedzīvojums pārvēršas cīņā par izdzīvošanu.

programme.title: Čalis iznīcina pasauli
programme.desc: Murgu trilleris par Čali – kurlu puisi ar dzīvu iztēli. Kad tiek noslepkavota viņa ģimene, noslēpumaina šamaņa vadīts, Čalis mācās apspiest savu bērnišķīgo fantāziju un izveidot to par nāves ieroci.

programme.title: Divas naktis seksam
programme.desc: Iespējams, ka vienas nakts sekss ar interneta sarakstē tikko iepazītu puisi nav tā labākā ideja. Bet sniega vētras dēļ iestrēgt ar viņu vienā dzīvoklī pirms pašiem Ziemassvētkiem – tas jau ir par daudz! Vai arī tā ir negaidīta iespēja labāk iepazīt vienam otru? Un pienācīgi atstrādāt šādas tādas kustības gultā?

programme.title: Lī
programme.desc: Patiesais stāsts par fotogrāfi Elizabeti "Lī" Milleri, modes modeli, kura kļuva par atzītu kara korespondenti Vogue žurnālam Otrā pasaules kara laikā.

programme.title: Zaļknābis pie stūres
programme.desc: Viņš ir ļoti jauns un prot ļoti ātri un labi braukt, kad jātiek prom no nozieguma vietas. Tas ir neviens cits kā labākais auto vadītājs, saukts par Mazo. Kad Mazais satiek savu sapņu meiteni, viņš vēlas pamest noziedzīgo pasauli. Taču tas nav tik vienkārši, kā šķiet, kad Mazais tiek iesaistīts vēl vienā noziegumā, kas apdraud viņa dzīvi, mīlestību un brīvību.

programme.title: Futbols: DFB Kauss. 1/4 fināls. Hertha - Freiburg
programme.desc: Report of matches from the German DFB-Pokal

programme.title: Futbols: DFB Kauss. 1/4 fināls. Bayern - RB Leipzig
programme.desc: Report of matches from the German DFB-Pokal

programme.title: NBA .. LA Clippers - Minnesota Timberwolves
programme.desc: The National Basketball Association composes of thirty teams across North America for men who are professional in this specific sport. Due to its popularity, this is one of four major professional sport leagues available in the United States of America and Canada. Furthermore, research suggests that it is widely considered to be the premier mens basketball league in the world. Legends of this particular sport include Kobe Bryant, Michael Jordan and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Valencia - Real Madrid
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. FC Barcelona - Paris
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.desc: The Six Nations Championship is an annual international mens rugby union competition between the rugby teams of England, France, Ireland, Italy, Scotland, and Wales. Its format is quite simple: each team plays every other team once making a total of 15 matches, with home ground advantage alternating from one year to the next. The current champions are England, who won the 2020 tournament.

programme.title: Bundesliga. Bayer - St.Pauli
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

First Time Fixer
programme.desc: A couple wins a tiny home on a game show and buy land to set it on. They soon find their five acres of desert comes with two dilapidated houses.

programme.title: Flipping 101 with Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Getting into property flipping can be daunting for first-timers, which is why Tarek El Moussa is on hand to share invaluable advice that will put them on course for handsome profits. With years in the industry, Tarek has seen and done it all. Now he wants to draw on some of his own experiences to ensure novice flippers dont make costly mistakes. Aided by Tareks knowledge and a few of his clients, surely nothing can go wrong? Reality series.

programme.title: Castle Impossible
programme.desc: Daphne and Ian aim to transform a 300-year-old outbuilding into a luxury home. Plus, the kitchen refurb may be doomed before it even begins.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: The Morrill family and their crew work with the locals on taking the house from demolition through their first big project: an Italian bathroom.

programme.title: Bahamas Life
programme.desc: The idyllic Bahamas are the perfect getaway for travellers and vacationers alike, but for some, once you visit the paradisaical islands, its hard to forget their beauty. These enamored individuals drop their city lives for these stunning Caribbean shores, leaving their livelihoods, stresses and struggles behind. In each episode of Bahamas Life, we detail the processes involved, the choice of islands and the remarkable real estate opportunities for prospective buyers looking to fulfill their dreams.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home International
programme.desc: British interior designer Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen joins European lottery winners as they hunt for a dream home. From exotic castles to refurbished cottages, Laurence helps them get their foot in the real estate market across the United Kingdom and Europe.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home International
programme.desc: British interior designer Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen joins European lottery winners as they hunt for a dream home. From exotic castles to refurbished cottages, Laurence helps them get their foot in the real estate market across the United Kingdom and Europe.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Tarek is a self-proclaimed real estate genius with determination and drive. Christina is Tareks picture-perfect wife, who Tareks friends still cant believe he landed. In each episode of "Flip or Flop", Tarek and Christina flip a new property. From the nail-biting purchase at auction, to the frustrating renovations and maddening showings, to the giddy acceptance of an offer, well follow along as these two relatively novice flippers try their hand at the toughest game in town. From purchase to resale, weaving their personal lives within the story of the flip. From paying cash, sight unseen, for a property at auction, through the hapless remodeling process, to the frantic sale, this young couple is putting everything they have into this venture.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A couple is excited to leave the busy city of Atlanta, GA, for a laid-back lifestyle on Ono Island, AL. After years of saving and planning, they are finally ready to make the move and find their dream home with a water view.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A engaged Seattle couple wants to leave city life and escape to Bainbridge island, Washington. Shes hoping to find a large yard for a new dog or their future kids, while he wants a turnkey house close to the ferry.

programme.title: First Time Fixer
programme.desc: A Los Angeles couple moves back home to Georgia and tackles renovating an old bungalow, blending their bold style with the homes original charm.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Log Cabin Living

programme.title: Log Cabin Living

programme.title: Log Cabin Living

programme.title: Backed by the Bros

programme.title: Renovation Goldmine
programme.desc: "Old is gold" is the mantra behind every custom home renovation in the new HGTV series, Renovation Goldmine. In each episode, the duo will revive old furniture and other pieces their clients already own and use the money saved to give families their dream home renovation.

programme.title: Vacation House for Free
programme.desc: Matt Blashaw realizes couples wishes to own a vacation home mortgage free. The secret? He helps them shop for and renovate a "diamond in the rough" home in their dream location to command top dollar as a vacation rental. The end result? The couple rents out the renovated home for maximum income part of the year, covering all their annual expenses. For the rest of the year they live in a Vacation House for Free!

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Castle Impossible
programme.desc: Daphne and Ian take on the cottage her grandfather used as his home. Their plan is to create a luxurious bedroom suite for brides and grooms.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: The crew has two large projects to juggle-the kids explore big ideas for the four bedrooms on the second floor, while the basement needs its walls demolished and new floors to be poured if they are to keep on schedule for the future family room.

programme.title: House Hunters

programme.title: House Hunters: Amazing Water Homes
programme.desc: A couple searches for a waterfront house for their three teens in Florida. She wants great views, but hes more focused on the homes interior.

programme.title: Fix My Frankenhouse
programme.desc: Boston-based home renovation experts and husband-wife team Mike and Denese Butler fix what they refer to as "Frankenstein" houses. These are older homes that have become filled with wonky layouts, misplaced staircases and maze-like hallways as different owners make changes over the years. Mike employs his construction know-how to create a functional flow, while Denese will capture the clients style with custom finishes. By blending elements of the older homes charm with modern design, the couple will produce stunning and cohesive spaces. Throughtout the episodes, Mike and Denese will overcome choppy rooms and wasted square footage for clients and work with their dads -- master carpenters John Butler and Peter Doyle -- to deliver one-of-a-kind projects for each family.

programme.title: Bahamas Life
programme.desc: The idyllic Bahamas are the perfect getaway for travellers and vacationers alike, but for some, once you visit the paradisaical islands, its hard to forget their beauty. These enamored individuals drop their city lives for these stunning Caribbean shores, leaving their livelihoods, stresses and struggles behind. In each episode of Bahamas Life, we detail the processes involved, the choice of islands and the remarkable real estate opportunities for prospective buyers looking to fulfill their dreams.

From purchase to resale, weaving their personal lives within the story of the flip. From paying cash, sight unseen, for a property at auction, through the hapless remodeling process, to the frantic sale, this young couple is putting everything they have into this venture.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Did a Swedish teenager photograph some of the most convincing UFO evidence ever? Is a video posted online showing a pterodactyl-like creature flying over Idaho the real deal? Why are headless goats repeatedly being dumped in an Atlanta River?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Long before banks, ATMs and check-cashing services, there were pawn shops. Pawning was the leading form of consumer credit in the United States until the 1950s, and pawn shops are still helping everyday people make ends meet. "Pawn Stars" takes you inside the colorful world of the pawn business. At the Gold and Silver Pawn Shop on the outskirts of Las Vegas, three generations of the Harrison family — grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey — jointly run the family business, and theres clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. The three men use their sharp eyes and skills to assess the value of items from the commonplace to the truly historic, including a 16th-century samurai sword, a Super Bowl ring, a Picasso painting and a 17th-century stay of execution. Its up to them to determine whats real and whats fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyones mind, "Whats the story behind it?" and "Whats it worth?"

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Beyond Oak Island
programme.desc: From the producers of "The Curse of Oak Island" and "The UnXplained" comes an exciting new documentary series, "Beyond Oak Island." Hosted by real-life treasure hunters Rick and Marty Lagina, this eight episode series chronicles the greatest treasure hunts of the past, present and (perhaps) future. "Beyond Oak Island" offers a combination of great story telling, compelling interviews with treasure-hunters, historians and experts, as well as on-location treasure hunts in progress, sometimes with the Laginas themselves. From pirates such as Blackbeard and outlaws like Jesse James, to Aztec gold, priceless historical artifacts from American history and sunken treasure ships, "Beyond Oak Island" digs deep into the many treasure quests across the globe, revealing amazing new details and clues from past searches - and in some cases, advancing the hunt.

Its up to them to determine whats real and whats fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyones mind, "Whats the story behind it?" and "Whats it worth?"

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Andy and Paul team up with the investigator of Skinwalker Ranch to probe an abandoned New Mexico ranch whose owner claims is infested with malevolent demons; their attempts at communication with this phenomenon opens up a chilling "conversation."

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Did a Swedish teenager photograph some of the most convincing UFO evidence ever? Is a video posted online showing a pterodactyl-like creature flying over Idaho the real deal? Why are headless goats repeatedly being dumped in an Atlanta River?

programme.title: Beyond Oak Island
programme.desc: From the producers of "The Curse of Oak Island" and "The UnXplained" comes an exciting new documentary series, "Beyond Oak Island." Hosted by real-life treasure hunters Rick and Marty Lagina, this eight episode series chronicles the greatest treasure hunts of the past, present and (perhaps) future. "Beyond Oak Island" offers a combination of great story telling, compelling interviews with treasure-hunters, historians and experts, as well as on-location treasure hunts in progress, sometimes with the Laginas themselves. From pirates such as Blackbeard and outlaws like Jesse James, to Aztec gold, priceless historical artifacts from American history and sunken treasure ships, "Beyond Oak Island" digs deep into the many treasure quests across the globe, revealing amazing new details and clues from past searches - and in some cases, advancing the hunt.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Andy and Paul team up with the investigator of Skinwalker Ranch to probe an abandoned New Mexico ranch whose owner claims is infested with malevolent demons; their attempts at communication with this phenomenon opens up a chilling "conversation."

Its up to them to determine whats real and whats fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyones mind, "Whats the story behind it?" and "Whats it worth?"

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are ready to wrangle some wild deals in the Lone Star State. Along the way, the guys test-drive a 1968 Buick Riviera, become riveted by a blacksmiths anvil collection, and meet up with NFL legend, Emmitt Smith.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Forged in Fire
programme.desc: Forged in Fire, an American competition series aired on the History Channel, challenges four new competitors to produce a knife in their own style with a small variety of metal objects to create from. The series, hosted by Wil Willis, consists of a three-round elimination contest to forge bladed weapons, with the final winner receiving $10,000 and the days championship title. Judged by experts in weapon history and use, the last two people standing must create in their own forge a Moro Kris sword, a blade which dates back to 300BC, in just five days. Filmed in Brooklyn, New York, the set referred to as "The Forge" sets the scene for this suspenseful show with propane forges, power hammers and hydraulic presses, with medical personnel being close by to treat any injuries or other health problems. If the medical personnel suspect that the competitors are unable to continue safely, they will be disqualified. Once each competitor has created their weapon, it will be put through a series of tests including chopping/slashing/stabbing objects such as ropes, ice blocks, animal carcasses and steel car doors. Having to meet a number of criterias, the smiths battle it out, without their swords, to become the best black-smith.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Join host Tony Harris as he investigates the most mysterious content ever captured and attempts to unearth the truth. Employing the assistance of experts and state-of-the-art technology, Tony is determined to decipher whether these photos, videos and audio recordings of purported supernatural and paranormal events are falsified or for real. He meets with eyewitnesses, conducts tests and stops at nothing to determine the truth.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum head to the heart of the Bluegrass State. In Lexington, Kentucky, the team brings a 41 Ford Coupe Deluxe roaring back to life, and legendary Coach John Calipari assists with a University of Kentucky basketball collection.

programme.desc: Sunshine State Steals. Rick, Corey, and Chum are fishin for big deals in the Sunshine State! Between beach days and dinner with WWE superstar Titus ONeil, the gang is casting a wide net in St. Petersburg, Florida.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum head to the heart of the Bluegrass State. In Lexington, Kentucky, the team brings a 41 Ford Coupe Deluxe roaring back to life, and legendary Coach John Calipari assists with a University of Kentucky basketball collection.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens Special Presentation
programme.desc: Ancient Astronaut theorists have long proposed that Earth is an extraterrestrial laboratory. If so, does it extend beyond humans into the animal kingdom? Accounts of animalist gods can be found across the globe that curiously mirror alien encounters.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: According to documents that were declassified by the FBI in 2014, Adolf Hitler may have survived World War II and fled to South America following the fall of Nazi Germany. In this series a team of investigators -- led by 21-year CIA veteran Bob Baer and war crimes investigator John Cencich -- undertakes a definitive search with the goal of finding out whether the notorious dictator actually survived the war and pulled off one of historys greatest disappearing acts. The team uncovers a mysterious Nazi lair in the Argentinean jungle and searches for evidence of a missing U-boat that may have transported Hitler out of Europe as Germany collapsed.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2
programme.desc: It is the last great mystery of WWII. The fabled Yamashita Treasure, a massive stash of gold bars and rubies worth billions, reportedly dumped in a cave by Japanese soldiers retreating from allied forces. While the fortune has become a legend, many experts claim there is no evidence it ever existed. Now, a dedicated group of investigators are resurrecting the dangerous search, using cutting-edge technology in pursuit of the truth, and unimaginable wealth.

programme.title: The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved
programme.desc: Every day, new information is discovered that helps us better understand how our Universe works. Some of this evidence solves mysteries dating back thousands of years. Some evidence offers new theories on how human civilization came into existence. In this season of The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved, well tackle mysteries such as an American Stonehenge built 500 years before Columbus, and how the Aztec Pyramids helped seal the downfall of the Mayan and Aztec empires. Well also look at some of the Roman Empires most iconic structures, and their connection to archeo-astronomy.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: Treasure hunters Rick and Marty Lagina, the stars of Historys "The Curse of Oak Island," learn of a new mystery that may even rival Oak Islands. Michigan native Kevin Dykstra is obsessed with a deathbed confession made by a lighthouse keeper in the 1890s about a national treasure dating back to the Civil War. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. The stolen loot was smuggled north some years later but ended up in Lake Michigan, where Dykstra believes it still remains. His quest to prove it ultimately takes him and his team to the bottom of Lake Michigan.

programme.title: How the Earth Was Made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: Ross Kemp: Deep Sea Treasure Hunter
programme.desc: In a brand-new Sky HISTORY show, Ross Kemp dives on a series of incredible shipwrecks around the British coastline to reveal some of the nations murkiest and best-kept secrets. From the remains of a slave ship discovered off Plymouth, to the Kaisers sunken Imperial Fleet in Scapa Flow and an experimental submarine aircraft carrier, which sank with all passengers and crew on deck during its sea trials, Ross uncovers Britains hidden maritime past.
