programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kurš gan negribētu zināt, par ko sapņo barbabērni, kamēr viņi mierīgi dus?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rivera grib uzņemt krītošas zvaigznes foto, tāpēc kucēni ceļ observatoriju. Kucēni apmaldās uz dabas takas un rod veidu, kā nokļūt mājās.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pirmās Celtnieklīča bibliotēkas būvēšana ir bišu pilna. Tas pieprasa īpaši saldu celtniecības risinājumu. / Vectēvs Grants māca Čārdžeram visus savus labākos deju soļus lielām deju sacensībām. Vai noklīdušas disko bumbas dēļ viņi neiegūs pirmo vietu?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Slēpošanas laikā Barbapapas uzceļ milzīgu iglū. Barbabravo and Barbalibs sacenšas drosmīgumā. Barbagudrais rada putekļu sūkšanas robotu, kas lieliski spēlē futbolu. Barbabērni sarīko spēli pret robotiem.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims izzina Rūkoņtaunu, lai atrastu vietu, kur baudīt jautrību vienatnē. Tims un Kaja cenšas sarīkot Pārkijam neaizmirstamu dienu. Kad vētras dēļ Reksiem jāpaliek mājās, viņiem jāizdomā, kā pavadīt laiku.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Suņi uzzina, ka Celtne ir slepena skeitošanas zvaigzne! Bet, būvējot skeitparku, viņiem jārisina problēma ar cementa maisījumu. // Pilsētā ieradīsies Čārdžera mīļākā dziedātāja Sjerra Spīdošā... Ja suņi spēs uzbūvēt tuneli viņas turnejas autobusam!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Darbīga bebra dēļ Celtnieklīcī pazūd elektrība! Lai to atkal pieslēgtu, komandai jāuzceļ vaininiekam jauna mītne. Pilsētas palīgu gājiena dienā Ātrmeistars sabojā ceļu. Suņukiem ar steigu jālabo viņa kaitējums.

programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcim vajadzīga pasta nodaļa! Bet, kad celtni apsēž vāveres, suņiem jāizdomā risinājums. Rabla komanda izmanto savas būvniecības prasmes, lai pārveidotu super auto mazgātavu un nomazgātu fermeres Zojas sušķīgos dzīvniekus.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pilsētas Čili Kūkarū ir apdraudēts, kad sāk iebrukt Rātsnama jumts! Par laimi suņi zina, kā to salabot.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora palīdz Benijam un vienraga dinozauram Uni atgūt pazaudēto burvju otu, lai Uni varētu atgriezties pie sava mīļdzīvnieka Zaķradža. Dora palīdz rumpulītei Hārtijai, lai viņa beidzot varētu piedalīties Rumpuļu spēlēs.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims nolemj pierādīt, ka Kajas tētis ir kapteinis Dinostārs.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims cenšas atpūsties, bet Tijai ir citi plāni.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims nopērk labākos cepumus pilsētā, bet drīz saprot, ka citiem tos vajag vairāk nekā viņam.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Vecākus pārsteidz aizvien vairāku reklāmas izkārtņu parādīšanās gar viņu ceļu. Gaisma no reklāmām ir tik spoža, ka naktī vairs nevar saskatīt zvaigznes un visur ir tik daudz stabu! Pietiks! Ģimenei jārīkojas! // Barbalala vēlas kļūt par kovbojmeiteni un Barbazū ir apņēmies viņai palīdzēt. Lai to panāktu, viņai jāiemācās aprūpēt govis un bulli. Tas nav viegli, bet, ja viņa pacentīsies, viņa būs lieliska kovbojmeitene.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pastāsta pārējiem, cik vareni bija Da Vinči izgudrojumi un nu katrs grib izgudrot ko savu. Ģēniju ir maz, bet ir jautri izgudrot. // Bērniem jāizvēlas - doties baseinā vai izbraukt ar riteņiem. Uzreiz izveidojas divas frontes un tikai Barbazū spēj nosvērt izvēles svarus.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, kurš ir pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki ar laiku pamanīs Maksa jauno, rotaļīgo labāko draugu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pilsētā ierodas fermere, kas lūdz Rabla komandu uzcelt kūti viņas cūciņai. Vai suņuki paspēs to paveikt līdz lielajai Rukšu ballei? Motores īpašā dzimšanas dienas dāvana aizkavējas, jo izrādās, ka Celtnieklīcim vajadzīgs lielāks skrejceļš.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Komanda ar Ķepu Patruļas Maršalu būvē pirmo ugunsdzēsības departamentu. Kad Maršala ugunsdzēsības mašīna tiek sabotēta, visi strādā kopā, lai nodzēstu uguni

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Reksu ģimene dodas ceļojumā cauri galaktikai, lai nokļūtu Raķešpasaulē. Tims un Kaja cīnās par Terijas rezerves biļeti uz Kosmoslendu. Tims, Tija un Tomijs rīko talantu šovu, bet nevar izlemt, kurš uzstāsies pirmais.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un omīte ir dārgumu meklējumos.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Ir Rūkoņas svētki, un Tims grib, lai viņa rūciens ir labākais.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš atrod Doras pazudušo dzimšanas dienas torti, un visa ģimene sarīko viņai pārsteiguma ballīti! Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz Mēnesnīcai atrast Mēnesspuķi, lai visi varētu priecāties Mēnessgaismas fiestā.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz pūķītei Svītijai iemācīties lidot un atgriezties pie vecākiem Mākoņu alās. Kad Lielā Sarkanā Cāļa burvju triks liek Karalienei un Garnadzim samainīties vietām, Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz viņus pārvērst atpakaļ!

programme.desc: Makss atklāj, ka daļa mistiskās kartes ir kļuvusi redzama. Haizivsuņa komanda cenšas atklāt pārējo karti.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Olija uzzina, ka viņai skolā ir jāuzstājas daiļslidošanā un viņa pierunā Haizivsuni viņai palīdzēt.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kucēni atrod dinozauru kaulus un nolemj uzcelt dinozauru muzeju.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma paziņo bērniem, ka divatā dosies atpūsties uz Lieldienu salu. Barbabērni, dvīņi un Stingrā kungs dodas izbraucienā ar jahtu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un omīte ir dārgumu meklējumos. Ir Rūkoņas svētki, un Tims grib, lai viņa rūciens ir labākais. Tims, Tomijs un Tija savā mājā atrod pazudušu mamutu.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims nolemj pierādīt, ka Kajas tētis ir kapteinis Dinostārs.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kad Barbatēta dzīve parādās Barbamamma un barbabērni, viņa māja paliek par mazu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad vējaina diena traucē būvēt saldējuma veikalu, Rabls, Miksa un Čārdžers ķeras pie darba. Rātsnamā kaut kas mistiski čīkst. Mērs Greitveja lūdz Rablam un Čārdžeram to atrast un salabot pirms viņas runas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu strādā pie tā, lai izglābtu Čārdžera dzimšanas dienas ballīti!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora, Zābaciņš un Karte palīdz tēvocim Tesoro atrast pazaudētos dārgumu pēddziņus un atkal kļūt par dārgumu karti. Dora un Zābaciņš pēta noslēpumainu atslēgu, lai iepazītu Doras vecvecvecmāmiņu - pašu pirmo zinātkāro pētnieci.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora palīdz pelēnam Peresam salabot burvju zobu suku, lai varētu saņemt dāvanu par savu izkritušo zobu. Dora iepazīstas ar kāpuru Karlosu, kurš vēlas kļūt pr tauriņu! Lai tas notiktu, draugiem viņam jāatrod sviestogu cienasts.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbamazuļi atrod ziloņu mazuli un slepeni par to rūpējas. Kā Barbatētis un Barbamamma reaģēs uz Borisu? Zilonis Boriss ilgojas pēc mājām. Barbapapas nolemj vest viņu atpakaļ uz Āfriku. Turpat viņi palīdz Borisam pielāgoties.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kurš gan negribētu zināt, par ko sapņo barbabērni, kamēr viņi mierīgi dus?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad komanda uzbūvē īpašu limonādes stendu Lūkasam un Lilija, īgnais Ātrmeistars ieripina to Celtnieklīča ielās. Kāpēc bebrs Krančijs šķērso ceļu? Jo Rabla komanda būvē tiltu, lai palīdzētu viņam nokļūt ceļa otrā pusē.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīci ir pārņēmis noslēpums. Kad pēkšņi pazūd pilsētnieku skulptūra, Rabla komandai pievienojas Čeiss, lai atrisinātu pazudušās statujas noslēpumu... un uzbūvētu gluži jaunu Zinātnes centru, lai palīdzētu izmeklēt.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma svin savas dzimšanas dienas. Barbabellai darba pilnas rokas, pieskatot pārējos. Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims nolemj pierādīt, ka Kajas tētis ir kapteinis Dinostārs. Tims cenšas atpūsties, bet Tijai ir citi plāni. Tims nopērk labākos cepumus pilsētā, bet drīz saprot, ka citiem tos vajag vairāk nekā viņam.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Karla jaunā restorāna būvdarbos notiek paukšķīgs pavērsiens. Rabls un viņa komanda ķeras pie uzkopšanas. Ziepains negadījums izraisa slidenas sekas visā Celtnieklīcī. Vai suņuki paspēs tās novērst pirms mēres Greitvejas lielā lēciena?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcis gaida iemīļotas TV zvaigznes jauno filmu. Bet vispirms vajadzīgs kinoteātris, kur to skatīties! Vectēvs pastāsta suņukiem par apslēptiem dārgumiem. Lai tos atrastu, komandai jāstrādā ķepu ķepā!

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Victorious tells the story of the sixteen year old Tori Vega. She grows up in the shadow of her older sister Trina, the big star of the family. But this suddenly changes as Tori attends Hollywood Arts, the best high school of performing arts. Soon she finds out that it is difficult to find her way and be accepted by her fellow students. While Tori is a great singer, dancer and actress, she doesnt realise it. Gradually she finds out that she is a true entertainer and very talented.

programme.title: Sam and Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat is an American teen sitcom, a crossover spin-off of both iCarly and Victorious. Sam and Cat meet under very uncommon circumstances, become friends and then roommates. They want to start their own business to be more independent and become part-time babysitters. Since then their lives have completely changed and are filled with all kinds of comic situations and various unbelievable and curious adventures, as looking after kids is not easy. Watch young charges playing mischievous tricks on Sam and Cat and have fun!

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob (unknowingly) gets a magicians magic wand lodged in one of his holes after he and Sandy attend a magic show. Later, SpongeBob gets the hiccups and begins transforming everything (and everyone) around him into ridiculous objects with each hiccup. At the end of the day, Sandy uses her knowledge of science to extract the wand from SpongeBob and return it to the magician. // On Friday the 13th, Mr. Krabs wakes up and swears to avoid all the bad luck that could come his way. Krabs paranoid superstitious antics quickly disrupt business at the Krusty Krab and the Krusty Krew are forced to address the situation, however, a reverse leprechaun (a Lepre-CANT!) materializes. The Lepre-Cant wreaks havoc with its bad luck magic all over the Krusty Krab. SpongeBob, Squidward and Krabs must team up to stop the unlucky creature.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester are a pair of hilariously individual twins who live in a weird and wonderful alternate reality where your neighbour could be a pair of disgruntled trousers or your best friend a floating cloud of bottom burp. But, unlike their friends and neighbours, Best and Bester have the unique ability to choose a new body every single day and, in doing so, experience life in a completely different way.

programme.title: Best and Bester

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: The school is looking for a new mascot, and Chloe and her new friends think they can make an impression by designing the winning entry. Chloe, Jinx, and Booch create a costume they are excited about, leaving it at the beach house until the they can present it at school. Meanwhile, Phoebe learns that Max has gotten them jobs at the school, but while he has a cushy Vice Principal job, she is the new Art teacher. Their argument over this leads to accidentally destroying it the new mascot costume. After Chloe discovers what theyve done and is furious with them, Max and Phoebe realize that being her guardian comes with more responsibility than they imagined.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Living together for the first time, half-siblings Jack and Lily are pushed outside their comfort zones as they learn to coexist while navigating new family dynamics, friends, and endless hijinks all while helping run the familys pet grooming and boarding business. With guidance from their parents and grandmother, the two will learn about each others previously separate lives, blended identity, vibrant culture, and the importance of family.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Eager to prove himself, Jack volunteers to run the Groom and Board alone for the day. Its supposed to be a chill day with no appointments - but the phone wont stop ringing! Unable to say no, Jack ends up taking in a chaotic giant snake, and multiple smaller pets - whom the snake sees as her dinner. Jack struggles to protect the little pets (and Halmoni) from the jaws of death.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When Squidward upsets his local garbagemen, they retaliate by filling his home with trash. Soon, the entire house is overtaken by a vast garbage jungle! With Squidward lost inside, SpongeBob and Patrick go on an adventure to find him. // In his latest secret formula scheme, Plankton disguises himself as a collectible figurine in order to obtain a limited edition Krabby Patty from Bubble Bass clutches. Instead, he winds up trapped amongst the other collectibles in his basement! Meanwhile, Karen and SpongeBob work together to free Plankton from his packaged prison.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Chloe has been absent from school while on missions with her siblings, and is assigned summer school to make up her missing work. Max thinks its hilarious that she will have to spend the summer in school, until he is also informed that he will be the teacher. While they both pout about having to be in class all summer, Phoebe goes solo on some superhero mission. When a couple villains get the upper hand, a mysterious new superhero names Captain Perfect arrives to rescue her. Phoebe discovers that she and Captain Perfect have many of the same interests, and make a good crime-fighting team. As Phoebe wonders if she might have a new partner, Captain Perfect privately lets a contact know that he has earned Phoebes trust and is ready for the next phase of his assignment.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Lily and Jack keep neglecting their chores. Which wouldnt normally be a problem except that Canyon Valleys business inspector is on her way to the Groom and Board, and the kids forgot to plunge the sink in the trailer. Will and Lil are tasked with cleaning up the trailer while Min and Jack rush off to the hardware store to buy a piece of pipe. But things go bad to worse as Will and Lil keep finding more problems to deal with in the trailer and Min and Jack must stall the Inspectors arrival. // Chuck announces his newest hustle: a sleepaway theatre camp! Knowing it must be a scam, Jack and Lil are eager to revel in the chaos. The "cabaret acts" include strange chanting, weird cat noises, and Halmoni (a kid at heart). But when they discover that its not JUST a scam to Chuck but in fact his lifes dream, they must save the show and the theater from destruction!

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Phoebe and Max unwittingly let Chloes friends watch a horror movie and eat candy, leaving them traumatized and craving more sugar. Jinx and Boochs parents want to meet with Chloes parents to discuss the lack of supervision at the beach house. With Hank and Barb away, Max and Phoebe are determined to prove they can be good guardians, and use a disguise gadget to transform into their parents to help Chloe. It goes well until the real Hank and Barb show up, and must transform into Max and Phoebe to keep the ruse going.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: iCarly is about teenager Carly who produces her own web show named iCarly along with her three friends Freddie, Sam and Gibby. The show is broadcasted from a studio Carly constructed in the flat where she lives with her 29 years old brother and guardian Spencer. While producing a webshow Carly is not looking for fame or fortune. Ideally she wants to be a role model for children and teenagers. iCarly ultimately features everything from comedy sketches and talent contests to interviews, recipes, and problem-solving.

programme.desc: iCarly is about teenager Carly who produces her own web show named iCarly along with her three friends Freddie, Sam and Gibby. The show is broadcasted from a studio Carly constructed in the flat where she lives with her 29 years old brother and guardian Spencer. While producing a webshow Carly is not looking for fame or fortune. Ideally she wants to be a role model for children and teenagers. iCarly ultimately features everything from comedy sketches and talent contests to interviews, recipes, and problem-solving.

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Victorious tells the story of the sixteen year old Tori Vega. She grows up in the shadow of her older sister Trina, the big star of the family. But this suddenly changes as Tori attends Hollywood Arts, the best high school of performing arts. Soon she finds out that it is difficult to find her way and be accepted by her fellow students. While Tori is a great singer, dancer and actress, she doesnt realise it. Gradually she finds out that she is a true entertainer and very talented.

programme.title: Sam and Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat is an American teen sitcom, a crossover spin-off of both iCarly and Victorious. Sam and Cat meet under very uncommon circumstances, become friends and then roommates. They want to start their own business to be more independent and become part-time babysitters. Since then their lives have completely changed and are filled with all kinds of comic situations and various unbelievable and curious adventures, as looking after kids is not easy. Watch young charges playing mischievous tricks on Sam and Cat and have fun!

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester are a pair of hilariously individual twins who live in a weird and wonderful alternate reality where your neighbour could be a pair of disgruntled trousers or your best friend a floating cloud of bottom burp. But, unlike their friends and neighbours, Best and Bester have the unique ability to choose a new body every single day and, in doing so, experience life in a completely different way.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Phoebe and Max unwittingly let Chloes friends watch a horror movie and eat candy, leaving them traumatized and craving more sugar. Jinx and Boochs parents want to meet with Chloes parents to discuss the lack of supervision at the beach house. With Hank and Barb away, Max and Phoebe are determined to prove they can be good guardians, and use a disguise gadget to transform into their parents to help Chloe. It goes well until the real Hank and Barb show up, and must transform into Max and Phoebe to keep the ruse going.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Living together for the first time, half-siblings Jack and Lily are pushed outside their comfort zones as they learn to coexist while navigating new family dynamics, friends, and endless hijinks all while helping run the familys pet grooming and boarding business. With guidance from their parents and grandmother, the two will learn about each others previously separate lives, blended identity, vibrant culture, and the importance of family.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick hires other Patricks to entertain at parties in Too Many Patricks, then in Much Tofu About Nothing, Pat-Thos shares a Hamdonian tale of love and pork products.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Raphaels brothers just dont understand him. Not only does he NEED to fight, hes really good at it, or at least thats what his new boxing trainer named Spuds told him. Spuds even ENCOURAGES Raph to work out his anger and negativity through fighting, even if his family and the annoying Pigeon Pete dont get it. But although the Turtles dont see eye to eye, they must work together to stop a rampaging Rocksteady and Bebop from wrecking the city! Social media blew up with videos of the two Mutanimals going berserk, fighting each other without seeming to know what was going on around them. And all the while, doing some serious damage to the city! As the dust settles, is there someone behind the whole plot, pulling the strings?

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: All of Raphs wildest dreams are coming true in the underground Mutant Battle Arena! He gets to let loose, fighting the massive Mutanimals Bebop and Rocksteady; even the hug-loving Mondo Gecko joins in on the fun! Raph doesnt hold back, and he gets his butt kicked with a smile on his face. Not only that, hes getting some serious bling in exchange for being part of the fights - gold chains, new clothes, even his very own vehicle, the TURTLE TANK! This makes Donnie, Leo, and Mikey very suspicious, since Raph has kept everything a secret from them. But audiences love Raph, which pleases the crime boss Kitsune and her street gang, the Purple Dragons. They run the arena with the help of an obnoxious investor named Knox. But Raphs dream may become a nightmare, as Raph is oblivious to the fact that hes walked right into their trap!

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: With only a few weeks left of summer, Lil has a genius idea: the family must visit her favorite theme park, Lake World, before Jack leaves! But when they arrive, its clearly less magical than Lil remembered: the fish dogs are droopy, the coaster aint coastin, the all-you-can-eat shrimp buffet is kaput. Jacks more interested in filming the janky park - frustrating Lil, who wants him to enjoy the day with his eyeballs. She consoles herself that the parks BEST ride will make up for the disappointing day. But when they get to where the ride should be, its gone! Devastated, Lil blames Jack for the horrid day, and they get in a bad fight. Back at the hotel that night, still mad at each other, the kids cant help but piece together clues hinting that the Otter Side might still be in the park... They have to find it! The kids must sneak past vengeful security guards and chaotic mazes to find the mythical ride, leading to an adventure neither of them expected.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: On their way back from Lake World, the Wylde Paks get stuck in a massive traffic jam. The situation gets so dire that all the drivers have no choice but to set up camp - a camp that quickly turns into its own, self-governing, rudimentary society. Struggling with a vacuum of power, Jack is chosen as their reluctant leader, but hes determined to usher them into peace. Meanwhile, Lily catches feelings for a boy in a nearby car, but because the boys dad and Will have serious road rage beef, their romance is forbidden. // Desperate to leave their mark on Canyon Valley, Jack and Lily set out to capture the great beast of Canyon Valley Lake - a giant fish that has menaced the town for years. After being swallowed whole multiple times, Lily and Jack realize they must take a different approach, but then they hear horror stories from other townsfolk about their own run-ins with the giant fish proving that bagging the beast is an impossible task. Despite all this, Lily and Jack attempt to accomplish the impossible.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: iCarly is about teenager Carly who produces her own web show named iCarly along with her three friends Freddie, Sam and Gibby. The show is broadcasted from a studio Carly constructed in the flat where she lives with her 29 years old brother and guardian Spencer. While producing a webshow Carly is not looking for fame or fortune. Ideally she wants to be a role model for children and teenagers. iCarly ultimately features everything from comedy sketches and talent contests to interviews, recipes, and problem-solving.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: iCarly is about teenager Carly who produces her own web show named iCarly along with her three friends Freddie, Sam and Gibby. The show is broadcasted from a studio Carly constructed in the flat where she lives with her 29 years old brother and guardian Spencer. While producing a webshow Carly is not looking for fame or fortune. Ideally she wants to be a role model for children and teenagers. iCarly ultimately features everything from comedy sketches and talent contests to interviews, recipes, and problem-solving.

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Victorious tells the story of the sixteen year old Tori Vega. She grows up in the shadow of her older sister Trina, the big star of the family. But this suddenly changes as Tori attends Hollywood Arts, the best high school of performing arts. Soon she finds out that it is difficult to find her way and be accepted by her fellow students. While Tori is a great singer, dancer and actress, she doesnt realise it. Gradually she finds out that she is a true entertainer and very talented.

programme.title: Sam and Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat is an American teen sitcom, a crossover spin-off of both iCarly and Victorious. Sam and Cat meet under very uncommon circumstances, become friends and then roommates. They want to start their own business to be more independent and become part-time babysitters. Since then their lives have completely changed and are filled with all kinds of comic situations and various unbelievable and curious adventures, as looking after kids is not easy. Watch young charges playing mischievous tricks on Sam and Cat and have fun!

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Raphaels brothers just dont understand him. Not only does he NEED to fight, hes really good at it, or at least thats what his new boxing trainer named Spuds told him. Spuds even ENCOURAGES Raph to work out his anger and negativity through fighting, even if his family and the annoying Pigeon Pete dont get it. But although the Turtles dont see eye to eye, they must work together to stop a rampaging Rocksteady and Bebop from wrecking the city! Social media blew up with videos of the two Mutanimals going berserk, fighting each other without seeming to know what was going on around them. And all the while, doing some serious damage to the city! As the dust settles, is there someone behind the whole plot, pulling the strings?

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: All of Raphs wildest dreams are coming true in the underground Mutant Battle Arena! He gets to let loose, fighting the massive Mutanimals Bebop and Rocksteady; even the hug-loving Mondo Gecko joins in on the fun! Raph doesnt hold back, and he gets his butt kicked with a smile on his face. Not only that, hes getting some serious bling in exchange for being part of the fights - gold chains, new clothes, even his very own vehicle, the TURTLE TANK! This makes Donnie, Leo, and Mikey very suspicious, since Raph has kept everything a secret from them. But audiences love Raph, which pleases the crime boss Kitsune and her street gang, the Purple Dragons. They run the arena with the help of an obnoxious investor named Knox. But Raphs dream may become a nightmare, as Raph is oblivious to the fact that hes walked right into their trap!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: Max and the Midknights
programme.desc: Max and the Midknights go to Fendras cottage to retrieve Sir Gadabouts stolen courage. Once inside the cottage, Millie makes a surprising discovery, but their search for Sir Gababouts courage is interrupted when Fendra returns home.

programme.title: Dora the Explorer
programme.desc: Dora is an interactive animated series about the cheerful and enterprising young girl Dora who likes to travel through the jungle of South America with her little monkey Boots. Her father and mother live in the jungle. Dora is curious of everything and wants to know about animals, flowers and plants of the forest. When she travels she always take with her a little back with survival equipment and a singing map.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger
programme.desc: Henry Hart is a normal eighth grade student, with an out of school job that takes him on amazing adventures. His cool part time gig as Kid Danger, takes him on out of this world adventures as the sidekick-in-training to famous superhero Captain Man. They go on bizarre and crazy travels, battling criminals and villains that try to attack his hometown and Captain Man himself. Meanwhile at home, Henry has to stay in hiding, keeping his sidekick job as a secret from his best friends, Charlotte and Jasper, and little sister Piper. What exciting adventures will Kid Danger get up to with Captain Man and will be he be able to hide his alter ego from his friends and family?

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: When Aang is assigned to help defend a town from a monster that has been plaguing the town, his lack of ability and knowledge becomes obvious, as he doesnt know what to do. However, when Sokka tries to rush to Aangs rescue during the fight, he himself becomes captured and is taken away by the monster, which turns out to be from the spirit world. Aang promises Katara that hell find Sokka and bring him back, but with Aang even doubting himself, will he be capable of finding where the monster went?

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. SpongeBob SquarePants is a ten-year-old with a red cap, goofy and friendly as hes always been. Lets not forget SpongeBobs friends, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward, whos a bit older than the others and works as a junior counselor. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: Max and the Midknights
programme.desc: MAX and THE MIDKNIGHTS is a medieval action-adventure comedy about a girl named Max and her group of friends, the Midknights, as they embark on a quest to help a neighboring kingdom of gnomes and discover that their own kingdom could be in danger.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger
programme.desc: Henry Hart is a normal eighth grade student, with an out of school job that takes him on amazing adventures. His cool part time gig as Kid Danger, takes him on out of this world adventures as the sidekick-in-training to famous superhero Captain Man. They go on bizarre and crazy travels, battling criminals and villains that try to attack his hometown and Captain Man himself. Meanwhile at home, Henry has to stay in hiding, keeping his sidekick job as a secret from his best friends, Charlotte and Jasper, and little sister Piper. What exciting adventures will Kid Danger get up to with Captain Man and will be he be able to hide his alter ego from his friends and family?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: At an awards ceremony for Marcus, Hazel wishes the night would be extra special for him. But when her Cosmo and Wanda fidget toys are confiscated by security, Hazel enlists the help of a mysterious janitor to find them - a janitor who turns out to be Denzel Crocker, unrenowned fairy hunter! He vows to capture the fairies for himself, so Hazel goes head-to-head with Crocker in an epic fight to get her fairies back. // Hazel and her class spend the night in the Dimmsonian museum. Throughout the night, Dev makes a series of wishes to try and bother Hazel and her friends, but in the process, accidentally brings on a spirit uprising. Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda discover Dev not only has a fairy, but its Cosmo and Wandas son, Peri! The whole team will have to work together to put the ancient spirits back to rest and save their sleepover.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester are a pair of hilariously individual twins who live in a weird and wonderful alternate reality where your neighbour could be a pair of disgruntled trousers or your best friend a floating cloud of bottom burp. programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Canadian computer-animated television series Top Wing presents an exciting story of four courageous young birds, Swift, Penny, Brody, and Rod on Big Swirl Island. They are cadets at Top Wing Academy with the best of the best students and have access to the most advanced technology. By operating different vehicles like a submarine, a boat, a jet or a motorcycle, the cadets learn how to work as a team and are the first to rush to the rescue to those in trouble. Major lessons are learnt with the help of their mentor Speedy. With every new task performed the cadets become braver, stronger and smarter.

programme.title: Super Duper Bunny League

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

Accompanied by unexpected fellow fanboys Bing and Roy, the gang heads to the arena. Things get a bit d-icey when the gorilla and rhino end up on the ice with the lunacorns. The enraged director is ready to shutter the whole thing unless they find some way to slip n slide out of it. Showdown on Fairway 18:A legendary putter is at the center of controversy when the Amarillo Kid returns to the zoo. The slippery armadillo needs Privates help to make good on an ill-advised bet with two gopher brothers. Whos the bad guy here though? The gophers show up at the zoo to actually warn the penguins about the kid! The story takes us on more twists and turns than a Pebble Beach golf hole!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: King Me/Private and the Winky Factory King Me: King Juliens archrival, Clemson, returns in another attempt to claim the lemur crown. This time the sneaky lemur has a document that "proves" King Julien is not the legitimate king because he wasnt born in Madagascar. A series of challenges to prove whos more kingly ensues, and the penguins try to stack the deck in Juliens favor by each switching brains with him. Simple, right? How could a plan like this possibly fail? Private and the Winky Factory: Privates favorite treat, the Peanut Butter Winky, is going the way of the dinosaur. Distraught that the snack cake is ceasing production, Private urges a raid on the Winky Factory where the last remaining Winkies are rolling off the production line. Impressed by Privates passion, Skipper gives him command of the mission! The young penguin learns theres a heck of a lot to digest when leading a team. programme.title: Sonic Prime

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel and Jasmine have planned their very first sleepover but Dev Dimmadome threatens to throw an even better party! To draw her classmates attention Hazel boasts that she lives in a luxury hotel and wishes her apartment building into The Wellsington Hotelsington Hotel. Now she must balance running the hottest hotel in Dimmadelphia and spending time with Jasmine and Winn before they check out of the friendship! // Hoping to win a class superlative, Hazel wishes to be famous at her school. Father Time cuts her a deal for 1,500 minutes of fame, but Principal Krentz is not happy about Hazels celebrity status and threatens to transfer her if she doesnt stop being a "distraction" by the end of lunch. With tons of time left on her wish, Nick of Time arrives with a solution: if Hazel acts like a New Yorker, her remaining minutes will turn into New York Minutes and pass faster. Can Hazel act New Yorky enough to beat the clock?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its picture day at school! And on top of that, theyre serving the most delicious pudding at lunchtime! Only problem is, Dev has control of the pudding supply and is hoarding it. Hazel takes the power back by wishing that everyone had an unlimited supply of pudding. Pudding is everywhere and Dev is out of business! But things take a turn when people cant stop eating it and turn into pudding zombies. Now Hazel not only has to save picture day, but also stop a pudding apocalypse! // Hoping to win "Most Spirited Hair" for School Spirit Week, Hazel wishes her hair had spirit! Cosmo and Wanda take this literally and give her hair a spirit, bringing it to life as Diana the Diva! When Hazel and Diana "butt heads" over how best to showcase her, Diana runs away. Hazel chases her all over town but cant catch her. Later, Diana shows up at Hazels school aiming to enter the contest on her own. Hazel must find a way to reconcile with Diana if she hopes to win Diana back and win the contest.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Cosmo and Wanda grant a wish to make Hazels potato project work for the Science Fair, they rewrite the rules of science for the whole universe! When the physical world goes haywire as a result, they cant undo it because not even their magic is not working correctly! And Sci, the Science Fairy, refuses to help Hazel because he does not approve of her shortcut. Hazel must learn the real science behind her potato project to power up Cosmo and Wandas wands and set the universe right again. // After watching a detective TV show with her dad, Hazel wishes she could solve a mystery like a genuine gumshoe. At first, she is wrapped up in the thrill of solving a mystery, but things get real when the landlord goes missing. Everyone is a suspect - kids at school, the strange new neighbors, and even Cosmo and Wanda! Things intensify when Hazel suspects her family is the next target. In a dramatic climax at dinner at her neighbors, Hazel unveils the truth. Is it foul play? Or is it just her imagination?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: After Hazel makes her one-millionth wish, Cosmo and Wanda promise her one rule-free wish as a reward. But when their magic doesnt work, they take a trip to Fairy World to investigate and discover Dev has taken control. Fed up with living in Hazels shadow, hes teamed up with Irep to give control of the Big Wand to anti-fairies and now kids all over the world have the opportunity to grant wishes rule-free. Before Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda can stop Dev, he traps Cosmo and Wanda in butterfly net cages and sends Hazel back home without her fairies to help her. While in power, Dev changes Fairy World to his own image and liking, and even reveals the existence of magic to everyone on Earth. Its total chaos. With the fate of Fairy World on her shoulders, Hazel enlists the help of Jasmine, Winn, Antony, and a few magical friends from past wishes, to rise up against Dev and his anti-fairy forces. Hazel must save Cosmo, Wanda, Peri, and Fairy World, before making a very special rule-free wish.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: 10-year-old Hazel Wells has just moved to Dimmadelphia with her family and is struggling with the change. On top of that, her beloved brother, Antony, is away at his first year of college and Hazel is feeling lonely without him. When she has a rocky start at her new school and Antony has to cancel a visit, Hazel tries to run away to visit Antony.

The ducklings are a rowdy bunch and throw a party, inadvertently attracting party-crashing rats and wasps who attack the party food. Private and the ducklings become trapped in the lair with the food, and as the rats and wasps try to break in, Private must think fast - how can he combat both gangs at once?

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The penguins notice its been quiet at night. Too quiet, somethings amiss. The rest of the zoo animals have been sneaking out at night to spend time partying in the park! The plan to sneak out then return by morning to avoid getting caught by Alice is put in jeopardy when they run into the classic New York problem - a traffic jam in the tunnel. How in the world can a traffic jam get cleared out of the tunnel in time? // The penguins make a new friend in Dode the dodo bird, who they clone back into existence after a pesky bout of extinction. Having grown up with no natural enemies, Dode has no fear and it leads him to daredevilish behavior - the kind that can make you extinct over and over again. The penguins dont want to see this keep happening to their friend, they need to find a way to slow this crazy bird down!

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Takes us on a roller coaster ride of music, laughter and stories geared to entertain The Chipmunks four generations of fans. Presented for the first time in glorious CGI, the series features ground-breaking animation and a new, original Chipmunk song in every episode. The series is an animated version of a prime-time sitcom and reflects the trials and tribulations of a single parent, David Seville, trying to raise six hyper-active Chipmunks. Like most parents, Daves patience will be pushed to the limit, forcing him to end most sentences in "ALVINNN!!!"

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: A Kipper for Skipper: Its off to the races when Skipper agrees to give a day off from hard training to the first penguin who can bring him a kipper. Private, Rico, and Kowalski battle their way to a fish packing plant where they discover Officer X has become Fishmonger X. The deranged X sniffs out the fighting penguins, capturing them and hauling them off to the pokey. Can they rediscover the teamwork they had forsaken in order to escape? High Moltage: The penguins are determined to make opening day of their favorite action stars blockbuster movie! Private, however, has an itchy problem - hes turned hideous because hes molting! The penguins need his hypercute powers to knock Alice out and disengage her new zoo security system. The despondent bird does all he can to reconstruct his cuteness, but sadly his hypercute powers distort to cause a hyperalarming, hypervomitous mess!

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester are a pair of hilariously individual twins who live in a weird and wonderful alternate reality where your neighbour could be a pair of disgruntled trousers or your best friend a floating cloud of bottom burp. But, unlike their friends and neighbours, Best and Bester have the unique ability to choose a new body every single day and, in doing so, experience life in a completely different way.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies
programme.desc: The series Bubble Guppies revolves around the underwater adventures of a group of mermaid-like preschoolers who life in the fictional underwater city of Bubbletucky. The episode starts with a sketch of Molly saying "Hi, its me Molly and its time for-" only to be stopped by Gil doing the subject of the show. When Gil or Molly says "Its time for Bubble Guppies!", the theme song starts. After the theme song, the Little Fish say the episodes name. Something happens when a character goes to school. After that, the school day begins and the Bubble Guppies say "Good morning, Mr. Grouper!". Later, the remaining Guppie tells Mr. Grouper about what happened earlier. He states "Lets think about it," and the characters discuss the topic. The pop song for the episode then begins.One of the Guppies will go to a shop that mostly focuses on the topic. The owner of the shop will asks questions about what he or she needs. Later, Mr. Grouper comes into the shop and says its time for lunch, and the "Lunchtime" song plays. At lunch the characters make a food joke about the subject of the episode. After lunch, another Gil and Molly sketch is shown. The Guppies do something fun which leads Mr. Grouper talking more about the topic, which leads into a dancing song. Mr. Grouper then says its time to go outside, the "Outside" song plays, and the Guppies make up a story about the topic. After this, Gil and Molly do another sketch.The Guppies go on a field trip that focuses on the topic, and the show concludes with the last Gil and Molly sketch and a shorter version of the theme song.

programme.title: Breadwinners
programme.desc: Two ducks with thin legs and round faces, SwaySway and Buhdeuce, are best friends. They fly around the water-based planet Pondgea in a rocket-powered van and deliver fresh bread to its citizens. They often find themselves in awkward and funny situations, and sometimes their workdays are quite dangerous. They find new friends, deal with opponents and have fun, making sure Pondgea always receive fresh bread on time.

Телеканал 2+2 онлайн гарантирует, что новый сериал понравится вам еще больше двух предыдущие проекты, действия которых разворачивались в Одессе и Киеве. К тому же, вы сможете испытать свои силы в решение запутанных дел - вдруг, вы поймете, кто именно является преступником, раньше, чем главные герои сериала? Смотрите 2+2 онлайн, и узнайте все первыми!

programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Юмористическое скетч-шоу "На троих" - это зажигательные шутки и забавные истории, которые подсказывает сама жизнь. Персонажи "На троих" хорошо знакомы зрителям - это обычные врачи, гаишники, полицейские, офисный "планктон". Новые серии и десятки комических историй - в проекте "На троих" от актеров "Дизель Шоу"!

programme.title: Реальный секс с Юлией Гайворонской
programme.desc: Секс — это единение с любимым человеком и найвысшее наслаждение. Это искусство получать удовольствие, зная своё тело и понимая, что может нравится партнёру. Секс-эксперт Юлия Гайворонская и "Реальный Секс" поможет разобраться вам в тонкостях и многообразии сексуальных игр, развенчает мифы вокруг многих тем и поможет вашему желанию воплотиться в реальность.

programme.title: Папа попал
programme.desc: Вас приветствует самое весёлое семейное телешоу "Папа попал". По правилам проекта участником шоу может стать абсолютно любой мужчина, у которого есть уставшая от жизни и бытовых проблем жена, а также минимум двое детей. В то время, как супруга уезжает отдыхать на далёкий и красивый курорт, ее муж начинает принимать на себя все обязанности своей благоверной. На протяжении 7 дней папа должен будет выполнять абсолютно все задания и поручения, которые обычно выполняет его жена. Уборка, стирка, поход за покупками, воспитание детей и поддержание уюта в доме - всё это теперь ляжет на сильные плечи украинских пап. Более того, участники шоу должны будут сделать еще и множество чисто мужских работ, которые долгие годы их просили выполнить их супруги. Починить забор, поклеить обои, отремонтировать автомобиль или научить ребёнка танцевать - всё это также ляжет на плечи наших мужчин-участников. Папа может? Посмотрим!

programme.title: Свадьба вслепую
programme.desc: Право быть счастливым имеет каждый. Но не каждый может осуществить его. "Свадьба вслепую" - это уникальный украинский социальный проект, который поможет разбитым сердцам создать новую крепкую семью. Однако его создатели сразу предупреждают о том, что даже у самой идеальной пары на проекте не всегда гарантирован успех в развитии отношений друг с другом.

programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Юмористическое скетч-шоу "На троих" - это зажигательные шутки и забавные истории, которые подсказывает сама жизнь. Персонажи "На троих" хорошо знакомы зрителям - это обычные врачи, гаишники, полицейские, офисный "планктон". Новые серии и десятки комических историй - в проекте "На троих" от актеров "Дизель Шоу"!

programme.title: Экстрасенсы-детективы
programme.desc: Международная команда экстрасенсов берется за расследование! Когда нет ни одной зацепки, когда полиция бессильна, им удается распутать самые громкие дела. Чтобы вычислить убийцу, им не нужны доказательства и свидетели. Они приходят на помощь, когда уже нет надежды узнать правду. Экстрасенсы направят свои способности на помощь простым людям. Тем, чьи родные или знакомые погибли при загадочных обстоятельствах. В расследованиях принимают участие экстрасенсы из разных стран мира: Великобритании, Эстонии, Чехии, Украины, Белоруссии, России, Австралии, США, Азербайджана, Болгарии, Грузии. В каждом выпуске программы они не соревнуются, а помогают друг другу. Параллельно с парой экстрасенсов расследование ведет профессиональный криминалист. Вместе они найдут виновных и восстановят справедливость!

programme.title: Отважные
programme.desc: Сериал рассказывает о работе специального подразделения полиции, занимающегося проблемами домашнего насилия. Четыре главные героини помогают женщинам, детям и даже мужчинам, страдающим от тирании, побоев, унижений и других способов угнетения со стороны близких людей. Героини сериала будут попадать в сложные и опасные ситуации, спасая жизни и восстанавливая справедливость. Каждая женщина из этой четверки тоже прошла через насилие: у каждой – своя история, скелет в шкафу и сильная мотивация заниматься именно этим делом.

programme.title: Короли палат
programme.desc: Поликлиника- место, где спасают жизни. Здесь работают два кардинально разных брата. Их отношения иногда доводят до слез, но чаще всего слезы появляются от смеха.

programme.title: Пришелец
programme.desc: Знакомься, это пришелец. Он попал на Землю случайно, его летающая тарелка сломалась рядом с орбитой нашей планеты. Теперь он живет в обычной украинской семье и пытается лучше понять человечество. Пока удается не очень, но пришелец не опускает... эммм... конечности. Помогать ему будет Оксана. Она работает ветеринаром, планирует будущее с парнем Колей, а еще — очень хочет, чтобы в ее жизни наконец что-то изменилось. Появление пришельца на горизонте перевернет всю ее жизнь вверх тормашками. Девушка поможет гостю адаптироваться к жизни на Земле и за это время изменится сама. Что из этого получится?

programme.title: Пришелец
programme.desc: Знакомься, это пришелец. Он попал на Землю случайно, его летающая тарелка сломалась рядом с орбитой нашей планеты. Теперь он живет в обычной украинской семье и пытается лучше понять человечество. Пока удается не очень, но пришелец не опускает... эммм... конечности. Помогать ему будет Оксана. Девушка поможет гостю адаптироваться к жизни на Земле и за это время изменится сама. Что из этого получится?

programme.title: Сдается домик у моря
programme.desc: То, что происходит в этой одесской семье, знакомо каждому. Когда герои конфликтуют, они все равно находят слова и поступки, которые показывают, что не так все плохо в нашей жизни. Ведь любые ссоры – не навсегда. С одной стороны – взаимоотношения и конфликтные ситуации, а с другой стороны – всегда сохраняется любовь. Как известно, в любом сериале должен быть главный герой; в нашем случае это хозяйка дома. Зовут её Жанна, и на ней держится вся семья. Если она уйдет, все развалится, как бывает во многих украинских семьях. Возможно, это наша модель жизни. Главная героиня очень добрая, поэтому под одной крышей живут и ее муж, и бывший муж, которого она временно приютила, дети от первого брака, ребенок от второго и ко всему прочему приезжает мама…

programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Юмористическое скетч-шоу "На троих" - это зажигательные шутки и забавные истории, которые подсказывает сама жизнь. Персонажи "На троих" хорошо знакомы зрителям - это обычные врачи, гаишники, полицейские, офисный "планктон". Новые серии и десятки комических историй - в проекте "На троих" от актеров "Дизель Шоу"!

programme.title: Дизель-шоу
programme.desc: Каждый выпуск "Дизель-шоу" - это час настоящего народного юмора в исполнении блестящих резидентов шоу. Среди участников "Дизель-шоу" талантливые актеры, известные КВНщики и самобытные шоумены. Вся команда, бесспорно, прекрасно чувствует друг друга, а потому так легко и непринужденно дарит хорошее настроение своим зрителям. Концерты Дизель-шоу давно уже стали желанным событием в каждом городе Украины, а поэтому билеты на такие мероприятия раскупаются мгновенно. Поэтому лучше купить билеты заранее.

Чтобы вычислить убийцу, им не нужны доказательства и свидетели. Они приходят на помощь, когда уже нет надежды узнать правду. Экстрасенсы направят свои способности на помощь простым людям. Тем, чьи родные или знакомые погибли при загадочных обстоятельствах. В расследованиях принимают участие экстрасенсы из разных стран мира: Великобритании, Эстонии, Чехии, Украины, Белоруссии, России, Австралии, США, Азербайджана, Болгарии, Грузии. В каждом выпуске программы они не соревнуются, а помогают друг другу. Параллельно с парой экстрасенсов расследование ведет профессиональный криминалист. Вместе они найдут виновных и восстановят справедливость!

programme.title: Плут
programme.desc: Сообразительный смельчак и бесстрашный бывший преступник по прозвищу Плут, пережив потерю близких, бандитскую юность и годы в тюрьме, в один момент круто меняет свою судьбу. Вместе с товарищем Андреем, который теперь работает начальников РОВД, он проворачивает дерзкую аферу и становится "оперативником Станиславом Бойко" – их общим другом, который год назад погиб. Новые документы, чужое имя и впервые в жизни законная работа – у Плута есть все, чтобы начать жизнь с чистого листа…

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Харьков
programme.desc: Продолжение культового сериала на телеканале 2+2 онлайн. Все фанаты криминальных историй смогут увидеть, как будет разворачиваться сюжет в новом городе, с новыми людьми и преступлениями, которые придется раскрывать умным следователем. Особенно трудно им будут даваться дела, в которых замешаны "оборотни в погонах" - сотрудники структур, которые должны защищать граждан, а не наоборот. Телеканал 2+2 онлайн гарантирует, что новый сериал понравится вам еще больше двух предыдущие проекты, действия которых разворачивались в Одессе и Киеве. К тому же, вы сможете испытать свои силы в решение запутанных дел - вдруг, вы поймете, кто именно является преступником, раньше, чем главные герои сериала? Смотрите 2+2 онлайн, и узнайте все первыми!

programme.title: Папа попал
programme.desc: Вас приветствует самое весёлое семейное телешоу "Папа попал". По правилам проекта участником шоу может стать абсолютно любой мужчина, у которого есть уставшая от жизни и бытовых проблем жена, а также минимум двое детей. В то время, как супруга уезжает отдыхать на далёкий и красивый курорт, ее муж начинает принимать на себя все обязанности своей благоверной. На протяжении 7 дней папа должен будет выполнять абсолютно все задания и поручения, которые обычно выполняет его жена. Уборка, стирка, поход за покупками, воспитание детей и поддержание уюта в доме - всё это теперь ляжет на сильные плечи украинских пап. Более того, участники шоу должны будут сделать еще и множество чисто мужских работ, которые долгие годы их просили выполнить их супруги. Починить забор, поклеить обои, отремонтировать автомобиль или научить ребёнка танцевать - всё это также ляжет на плечи наших мужчин-участников. Папа может? Посмотрим!

programme.title: СуперЖена
programme.desc: Беспрецедентный баттл за титул суперженщины начинается! Каждую неделю 4 обаятельные и привлекательные девушки будут выяснять, кто же из них достоин звания лучшей жены. С понедельника по четверг дамы будут приходить друг к другу в гости, чтобы оценить хозяйственность, саморазвитие и сексуальность конкуренток. Сжульничать и выставить желаемое за действительное им не удастся, ведь за ними будет наблюдать опытный психолог. В пятницу он проведет беседы тет-а-тет и соберет девушек вместе, чтобы расставить все точки над "i".Хитрые манипуляторши, ведические жены, роковые соблазнительницы, яжматери и боевые подруги… Каждая женщина убеждена, что именно ее модель поведения самая правильная. Но кто же из них может покорить не только сердце своего мужчины, но и впечатлить конкуренток?

programme.title: Дизель-шоу
programme.desc: Каждый выпуск "Дизель-шоу" - это час настоящего народного юмора в исполнении блестящих резидентов шоу. Среди участников "Дизель-шоу" талантливые актеры, известные КВНщики и самобытные шоумены. Вся команда, бесспорно, прекрасно чувствует друг друга, а потому так легко и непринужденно дарит хорошее настроение своим зрителям. Концерты Дизель-шоу давно уже стали желанным событием в каждом городе Украины, а поэтому билеты на такие мероприятия раскупаются мгновенно. Поэтому лучше купить билеты заранее.

programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Юмористическое скетч-шоу "На троих" - это зажигательные шутки и забавные истории, которые подсказывает сама жизнь. Персонажи "На троих" хорошо знакомы зрителям - это обычные врачи, гаишники, полицейские, офисный "планктон". Новые серии и десятки комических историй - в проекте "На троих" от актеров "Дизель Шоу"!

programme.title: Реальный секс с Юлией Гайворонской
programme.desc: Секс — это единение с любимым человеком и найвысшее наслаждение. Это искусство получать удовольствие, зная своё тело и понимая, что может нравится партнёру. Секс-эксперт Юлия Гайворонская и "Реальный Секс" поможет разобраться вам в тонкостях и многообразии сексуальных игр, развенчает мифы вокруг многих тем и поможет вашему желанию воплотиться в реальность.

programme.title: Свадьба вслепую
programme.desc: Право быть счастливым имеет каждый. Но не каждый может осуществить его. "Свадьба вслепую" - это уникальный украинский социальный проект, который поможет разбитым сердцам создать новую крепкую семью. Однако его создатели сразу предупреждают о том, что даже у самой идеальной пары на проекте не всегда гарантирован успех в развитии отношений друг с другом.
